It's on the correct side for smaller queues to downtown disney too.
Manager Response: Hi Genia R,   Thank you for mentioning our hotel's excellent location to magical Disneyland! I'm glad you chose us. I am thrilled that the veggie burger suited your taste and found our room rates affordable. We always aim to provide the bang for your buck! I am concerned to hear about the visible signs of usage in the room, and I'm sorry for the letdown. We'll keep your comments in mind for future enhancements. We are hopeful for your return.  Take care!  Anna R Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: The housekeeper STOLE my Apple AirPods, which I should have probably placed in the safe but I did not think it was necessary. I suppose one man's junk truly is another man's treasure. The free breakfast is all cheap food. My husband and I took one look at the breakfast selections and walked out. The water pressure in the shower sucks, it is unfortunate to see how cheap the owner is. Lastly, THEY HAVE BED BUGS! Instead of coming home and preparing for Christmas after our vacation, we were stuck thoroughly sanitizing all of our items. Our skin is red and itchy. We notified the staff and manager but no one seemed to care. Please stay away from this hotel to ensure that the only thing you bring back from your vacation are souvenirs!
Manager Response: Erica R,  I'm sorry to hear about the issues you had with our staff, breakfast selection and rooms. Our aim is to provide a trouble-free stay, and what you described certainly fell short of that. I've shared the details of your review with the hotel, and I'm very positive they'll take the necessary steps so similar situations can be avoided. We have also sent you a private message to follow-up on this matter.  Thank you for being our guest and for choosing to stay with us! We hope to accommodate you again for chance to provide you with a much better experience.  Best regards,  Joel A Case Manager IHGService

Summary: We stayed two nights and had a great stay. Our room was large, and within a quick walk to Disneyland and restaurants. The price includes breakfast also, although the parking is additional and valet. The staff were all really pleasant and helpful. Happy to recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in a great location if you want to walk to Disneyland.  About an 8 minute walk.  We never needed our car which is a good thing because the parking situation is strange.  They do not have onsite parking.  You pull up and they valet your car at an offsite lot somewhere which made me a bit nervous.  When we left they had the car ready to go.  The hotel rooms were spacious, clean and in good condition and had a microwave and refrigerator. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast area was always clean and well stocked. The people who worked in the breakfast area could have been friendlier.  Overall a great stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After a long drive down, I wasn’t happy to see my only option was valet parking. I was also told my car would be off-site. When I tried to cancel my reservations, I was told I could not since it was prepaid. I had to suck it up and wonder if my car was okay. They left my car in their small site but had to talk to a construction guy spraying blue spray next to my car. ( Construction next door).  We tried to get Disneyland tickets at the desk but they were all out. ☹️ The room was nice though I had to get a cockroach out.  The freeway was our view and noisy. Ask for another room per the replies from the manager’s replies on Trip-Advisor.  Breakfast was great on a good note.
Manager Response: Hi mom_on_timeout,  Thank you for choosing our brand and going out of your way to leave us your insights. It has always been our goal to deliver exemplary service and we apologize that this was not met during your stay. Sad to hear that you were not happy with our valet parking and the level of service received. Your comments will only make us work together in improving our services.   Even though your stay was not spotless, we hope that your future trips will give us an opportunity to welcome you back to the property.  Many Thanks,  Ronald R. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: This trip to Disneyland was a gift from my daughter and her family for my 70th birthday.  We had a great time.  The hotel was excellent you could not ask for a nicer place to stay. I wonder what kind of mattress they use  Best night sleep
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland this resort is wonderful. The suites are big and spacious, the whole resort is impeccably clean. It was only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. The feee breakfast was a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Xim88,  Thank you for staying with us!  We appreciate your feedback and are hppy to hear you loved your stay with us. Our spacious room suites and close proximity to Disneyland are the main reasons why our guests love to stay with us. We hope you visit us again in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New, fresh hotel with a great close location to Disneyland. As a family of 5 we walked daily without fuss. Only main concern was the noise from the freeway due to our room facing the front of the hotel (over the freeway). Daily breakfast was great, had all we need. Friendly staff. Coffee machine in room. Disneyland was fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear larissamM9833JP,  Thank you for being our guest here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to hear you loved your stay, our spacious room suites, complimentary breakfast and friendly staff. Please know we have our front desk staff available to assist you with any special requests such as room location. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Serene Retreat in a busy location
Summary: The beauty of landscaping and detail of furnishings has not been complimented enough in reviews I have seen. I've taken a few pictures of amenities that emphasize detail and amenities that I appreciate. Price was low- I booked early, came off season and I took advantage of HI's annual rewards sale. I feel I am getting much more than I paid for.  My teenagers are doing the crazy of Disney while Mom gets a chance to unwind in a very peaceful near resort quality Holiday Inn. I would recommend this to others and stay here again. The only nuisance I can disagree with others on is freeway noise. Booking the cheapest available price, I do have a room facing I5 and I can hear it pretty darn well, but the rest of this hotel is very pleasant, relaxing and pristinely kept. I can't complain
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback and compliments on our hotel. We are delighted to hear you loved your stay here with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Our spacious rooms, complimentary breakfast, high speed internet, lobby lounge and pool are the reasons why guests love to stay with us. We hope you visit us again soon! Please contact us directly at the front desk next time you are ready to book.  Sincerely, The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: I can't say enough wonderful things about this hotel!   It is new, clean, and the staff is super friendly!  Forget the 70s style hotels directly across the street from Disneyland --- this hotel is only a 10-12 minute walk from the security line at Disneyland.  The room is complete with a refrigerator, bar sink, microwave, and a Keurig coffee machine.  The rooms also include a sound machine, which I thought was a nice touch!  The beds were very comfortable as well.  We didn't much time in the rooms, being at the parks all day....But there is breakfast included starting at 6:30, your typical Holiday Inn Express breakfast.   There is a convenience store called the Cove within a 5 minute walk for drinks, snacks, cases of water, etc.  Also between the hotel and DL is a McDonalds and
Manager Response: Dear kw030315,  Thank youf or choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Our spacious rooms are equiped with coffee maker, small refrigerator and microwave for your conveneinece. We offer complimentary breakfast daily from 6:30am-9:30am and it is included with your stay along wit high speed interet. Our spacious rooms and walking distance to Disneyland's main gate and restaurants are the reasons why our guests love to stay with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday Inn for 6 nights and really enjoyed the room.  Mind you we spent a lot of time out touring and visiting the Parks however when we got back the room was made up and ready for us.  Room and linen was clean, bathroom was clean and well stocked.  Front desk staff were really friendly and very helpful with answering any questions we had.  Didn’t try the downstairs restaurant, looked interesting though.  Anaheim Resort Transportation bus stops right at the hotel which was very handy - comes by every 30 minutes and takes you right to the front door of the Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Dear 826lt,  Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are happy to hear you loved your stay with us. Our location is conveniently close to Disneyland's main gate. Only about 5-8 minutes walking distance to the park. There is the ART shuttle stop just down the street from us that goes around town before getting to the park. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Six of us (four adults and two kids) booked two rooms at this hotel when visiting Disneyland.  It was a great choice as the hotel is a cut above most other Holiday Inn Express properties and it is only a short walk to the Disneyland gates.  The hotel is relatively new and the rooms are spacious.  Of particular benefit was that two adults and two kids slept well in the two queen beds plus the sofa bed which meant each child had their own bed.  The breakfast was typical "free" HI Express fare but the breakfast room and the availability of food was as good as we have seen in similar hotels  Staff were uniformly helpful and efficient at check in and when storing bags after check out, the rooms were cleaned well and the swimming pool and guest laundry were excellent.  This really was
Manager Response: Dear blenheim72,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim resort. We are thrilled to hear you and your family had a comfortable and excellent stay. Our staff will be happy to know they were recognized for their service. Our spacious rooms and free breakfast are the resons why our guests love us. We hope you visit us again!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Excellent newer hotel within walking distance of Disneyland!
Summary: This is a great hotel. We stayed for six nights and it was so nice to be able to walk to Disneyland from the hotel. It's great that they have a full breakfast and the cafeteria area is really nice! Great cost saver! The hotel is three years old, so it's new compared to the other hotels along the 'strip' across the street from the Disney entrance. The actual location of the hotel is behind a Marriot and in front of the freeway. If you like quiet, ask for the side that doesn't face the freeway. We were on the 5th floor and could see the fireworks. The swimming pool is smaller but still nice. This hotel is very accommodating. We rented a scooter that they had ready for us on arrival, and on our last day they kept all of our bags for us since we didn't fly out until after 8pm. The
Manager Response: Dear Tracy M,  Thank you for being our guest here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We thank you for your feedback and are happy to hear you had a comfortable stay with us. Our hotel is fairly new and our location is conveniently located about 8 minutes walking distance to Disneyland park. There is lots to do in the area such as Garden Walk shopping mall, Anaheim Packing district and other great restaurant options. Our spacious rooms, complimentary breakfast and high speed internet are the reasons why our guests love to stay with us! We hope you visit us again.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel and so close to Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed here for a week with 2 adults and 2 children in an Enchanted Queen room with 2 Queen beds and a sofa bed.  I cannot fault this hotel. The rooms are spacious and very clean. The staff are so friendly and knowledgeable about the area (thank you Frankie and Tyler). All the staff greeted us with a friendly hello.  The breakfast was a great start to a day at Disneyland which was only 8 mins walk away. Thanks again to the fabulous kitchen staff.  The breakfast room and lobby were beautifully decorated for Halloween. Great pool and spa.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend it highly.
Manager Response: Dear  BooQue,  Thank you for being our guest here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort! We are happy to heat our staff treated you well and that you had a fabulous stay with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed for 3 days at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites and I must start by saying the room was immaculate. The toilet/bathroom was like it had been built that morning. The hotel and grounds were very clean and well kept. Breakfast was included and was more than adequate with pastries and sausages and eggs on offer, amongst other things. It is about a 7-8 minute walk to Disneyland, I have seen some reviews that say up to 15 minutes, this is just not true, it's literally around the corner in a great location. More or less opposite the HoJo. Wifi was great in room.  I would highly recommend this hotel as it's clean and close to Disneyland and great value.
Manager Response: Dear BrisvegasPilgrims,  Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are thrilled to hear you love your stay and our spacous rooms. Our complimenatry breakfast buffet and close proximity to disbeykand's main gate are the reasons why our guests love us. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: At arrival Tyler was incredibly friendly, helpful and accommodating. The valet staff were all very attentive and quick. The room was spacious and clean. The breakfast selections were delicious and the space was appropriate so guests weren’t bumping into each other and there were plenty of tables! We visit DLand often and I keep trying different places to try to find our “go to.” Price matters since we spend most of our time out of the hotel. That said, we stay mid price range because quality, cleanliness, location and safety matter. This hotel was a little above what I prefer to pay, but worth it. We usually stay at places south of the main entrance and I’m not sure how in all these years I’ve overlooked this little gem on the North side of the entrance. The walk to the park was
Manager Response: Dear KBoyd462,  Thank you for being our guest and for choosing to stay here with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are ecstatic to hear you had an excellent stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and that our staff treated you well. Dianeyland's main gate is only about an 8 minute walk, making it a convenient location of our hotel. We hope you visit us again in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My girlfriend and I recently got breakfast here and my girlfriend ordered orange juice and we had already gotten our check when the waiter walked by with orange juice and we asked for a refill. He refills her drink and then takes the check off the table goes back and adds on $4 for another orange juice without even telling us it cost extra. Completly disrespectful.
Manager Response: Dear Matt O,  I believe you have the wrong hotel. We do not have a full service restaurant and we do not have waiters.

Summary: Great welcome service by Rimaro (hope i got his name right). Informative about surrounding and opening times for Disney parks.  Hotel rooms are spacious on 5th floor near lift. Wide comfortable beds. Clean and new. No movable shower heads tho. Wish they had that. Ample supply of bath towels for our family of 4 in the room. There is an additional sink at a mini coffee bar area next to toilet which is very convenient. Good design.   Generous with other amneties if you request at reception. More than 1 reception working at front desk throughout night.  Always hot water and drinks available at lobby.  Great location. Only 10mins walk from disneyland parks. Enjoyed the walk back. MacD is only 5mins walk away behind.
Manager Response: Dear Mav-kays,  Thank you for being our guest here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Ramiro will be delighted to hear his service did not go unnoticed! Our spacious rooms, complimentary breakfast and close proximity to Disneyland are the top resons why our guests love to stay with us. We hope you visit us again!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Very pleased with check in.  Staff was very cheery and polite also very welcoming.  Room was great and clean.  Asked to have a room away from freeway and that was what we received.  Slept very well.  They also have white noise machines in the room.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Nice breakfast.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Kim E,  Thank you for being our guest and for choosing to stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are happy to hear our spacious rooms and friendly staff helped make your stay a memorable one. Our white noise machines are installed in every room to help our guests get the rest they deserve. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Overall appearance of the hotel is nice! We just had to change rooms because  when we entered, there was a bit of an unpleasant smell but they immediately changed our room, double checked if we were satisfied, nice service recovery!  Max and Romero, great service! All smiles and ready to help, please thank them for me!   It is a 5-8min walk to Disneyland, not bad at all!  I’d say our stay was very pleasant! Happy with the service! Definitely worth the stay!
Manager Response: Dear Wilna Z,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We apologize for the inconvenience on having to switch rooms but are happy to hear we were able to help make it all better. Matt & Ramiro will be thrilled to hear their service did not go unnoticed! We hope you visit us agin in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Huge rooms! Great location. Great Breakfast. Easy walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Think I said it all in the title. Right behind the Courtyard Marriott. Spacious rooms with 2 queen beds, and pullout sofa and still floor space. Great breakfast and the staff worked hard to keep the area clean, even after toddlers spilled all over the place.
Manager Response: Dear GrandmaCy,  Thank you for beign our guest here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and that you enjoyed our breakfast and friendly staff. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: A very comfortable hotel with a very good breakfast buffet - plenty of choice. You can get there from the airport in about a half hour by shuttle bus, although it can take three times as long when the traffic is bad.
Manager Response: Dear Marian B,  Tank you for your feedbak and for staying with us! We are happy to hear you loved your stay and our hotel. We are  located between LAX airport and John Wayne airport which makes it a convenient location to stay at. Our spacious room suites and complimentary breakfast are also another reason to book our hotel.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice 15 minute slow walk to the gates and yummy keto breakfast options.
Summary: This is my second time at this location. Always clean with great customer service. I only gave it 4 stars because I ended up on the freeway side and the noise of it bothered me but not my husband. I am a light sleeper..staff have me free earplugs and there is a noise machine in the room. Now I know for next time to ask for the other side!!! My hubby and I eat keto and at scrambled eggs and pork sausage every morning...you can grab some walnuts or boiled eggs too! Wish they had sugar free yougurt...instead of the full sugar ones.parking fee  is the same whether you valet or self park. Mattress is comfortable and bathrooms are large and updated.
Manager Response: Dear JolieAnnePhoto,  Thank you for staying with us! We are happy to hear you had a great stay here with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Please know our staff is always willing to find and accomodate a room with special reuqests. We do offer a white noice machine in each room to help ease your sleep. We are happy you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, spacious room suites and our customer service. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My new favorite in Anaheim. The hotel is clean and comfortable. Their staff was also very friendly. I highly recommend this place. Plus it's only about 5 minutes walking distance from Disneyland. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Myra M,  Thank you for staying with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We value your feedbak and are delighted to hear you loved your stay! One of the resons why our guests love us is because of the close proximity to Disneyland's main gate. Our staff will be happy to know their customer service did not go unnoticed. We hope you visit us agin in the future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: A great stay walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: Let me start off by saying we have stayed at many hotels in the Disneyland resort. Some very nice and some not so nice. We chose to stay here because the room accommodated 5 people with 2 beds and a sofa sleeper. We stayed for 7 nights and had no issues or complaints! Room was nice, clean and a good size. Our room was next to the freeway but noise was not a problem. Every now and then we would hear the really loud car or truck but no controlling that. Breakfast was delicious every morning with plenty of seating.  The walk to Disneyland only took 10 minutes making this hotel a great option!!
Manager Response: Dear Tony R,  Thank you for staying with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort!  We are more thanhappy to hear you loved your stay and our spacious room suites. Please know our front desk staff is always happy to assist and accomodate a room with special requests. We hope you visit us agin!   Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This was our first stay at this hotel and it did not disappoint! Hotel was modern, rooms and beds were comfortable, and breakfast area was the perfect way to start the day. One family in our group had a corner suite that you could enjoy the fireworks from each night! Valet parking was helpful as available parking is minimal at best. We took the 10 minute walk to Disneyland each day. We have stayed at other hotels in this vicinity and this is a definite upgrade over those! Location, Price, and Comfort all combine to make this a great place to stay. Have already made reservations to return in November!
Manager Response: Dear MrHendu,  Thank you for your feedback! We are delighted to hear you had a comfortable stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Our spacious and modern rooms are perfect for a family trip. We hope you visit us again in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: A great hotel! You will not be disappointed.
Summary: It was my wife and our 3 kids and we were traveling to watch baseball games and visit Disneyland. You are within 15 minutes to the Angels ballpark and only 45 minutes to Los Angeles.(roughly depending on traffic) and an hour and a half from San Diego. We ended up staying here for 6 nights and we loved it! The staff was amazing, the kids loved the breakfast, and the room was perfect for our family! If you are looking for a hotel in the area this is the one to get!
Manager Response: Dear Bobby B,  Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Express & Suites as your travel destination! We are happy to hear you loved your stay with us! We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: The primary reason why I made the reservation to stay at this hotel was that at the orginal hotel where we were staying at they we overbooked so we tried our luck over here at this property. The people at the front desk was friendly. No doubts about that. For breakfast I noticed that there was a good assortment of eggs, sausage, bread and even peanut butter. To drink there was coffee, orange juice and not mention milk.  As for my room< I did put a notation that I do not want to hear any noise whatsoever and what did I get - exactly that. No noise at all   P. S. By the way, I slept very well in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Abrelascajas,  Thank you for staying with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort! We are thrilled to hear you had a comfortable stay with us and that our staff treated you well! Our spacious rooms, compimentary breakfast and close proximity to Disneyland park are the reasons why our guests love us. We hope you visit us again in the future!  Sincerely,  The Team at The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. It has the nicest front desk employees ever! Such an easy check-in! Great rooms, great pool, great breakfast! Very clean and new! Super comfortable beds! Highly recommend this hotel! We very much enjoyed our week here!
Manager Response: Dear Jodi S,  Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our spacious rooms do have comfortable mattresses, coffee maker, small refrigerator, and microwave. Our location is perfect for a Disneyland getaway, as we are of close proximity to the park. We hope you visit us again in the near future.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Lovely , updated hotel . Spacious suites , comfy beds . Great breakfast . Walking distance to Disney and lots of food choices . Friendly and helpful staff , nice valet guys . You can see the Disney fireworks from your room every night . No issues at this hotel , will stay again
Manager Response: Dear Reena R,  Thank you for staying with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! Our Spacious rooms, complementary breakfast and close proximity to Disneyland and other areas are the main reasons why our guests love to book with us! We cannot wait to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed for two nights. Decided to stay here because it was close to where I was going. One of the few things I liked was everyone’s customer service. The staff  was amazing. The breakfast was good eggs, sausage, bread, oatmeal. They had a variety. The one thing I hated that I was able to hear the next door person snore. It was a nightmare. The first night it was that and the second time was the person next door kept coughing. Don’t know if it was the same guest .... but man it kept me up. The hotel was very clean. Kids had fun in the pool. I don’t see myself staying here in the future. Unless , I really have to.
Manager Response: Dear Akings209,  Thank you for choosing to stay here with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our spacious rooms, complimentary breakfast and customer service of our staff. We are sorry to hear you did not get a good night sleep. We do offer white noise machine in every room to help ease your sleep. We hope you give us a second chance in the near future.  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn express and Suites for 7 nights and loved it - it is such a great hotel near to Disneyland. Its a new and smallish hotel which we liked. The hotel and rooms are clean. The beds are very comfortable. Rooms are a great size and the hotel is very quiet. I requested a room on the opposite side from the freeway and heard no traffic noise and the hotel itself is quiet. The walk is about 8 mins to the gate. Staff are friendly. The only downside is the free breakfasts are pretty basic but still ok for having something in your stomach before you leave for the day!
Manager Response: Dear dlhlsjb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort! We are happy to hear you had a comfortable stay with us and that our location was of easy access to Disneyland's main gate. Our breakfast is one of our guests favorites which offers something for all. Our breakfast buffet consists of sausage, eggs, bacon, muffins, fresh whole fruit, oatmeal, yogurt and other breakfast items like cereal. We hope you had a magical day at Disneyland and we hope you visit us again in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Excellent customer service by Mr. Tyler P. at the front desk. He welcomed my family with kindness and assisted us with all requests. He deserves a promotion!!!!!. Hotel was very nice and will stay again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear rome7pa,  Tyler will be thrilled to hear he helped you and your family feel welcomed! Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort. Our spacious rooms, complimentary breakfast and pool offers a great stay for family vacations. We hope you visit us again in the near future! We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed here for three nights and had a very enjoyable stay. Hotel within easy walking distance of Disneyland - about 10 mins. Very friendly staff and we were able to check in straight away even though we arrived well before official check in time.
Manager Response: Dear Keith B,  We are so happy to hear you had a comfortable stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort! Thank you for booking with us! Our location and proximity to Disneyland is an easy 8-10 minute walk to the park's main gate. Our staff is always ready to assist you during your stay with us. We do our best to accommodate early check ins and we are thrilled to hear we offered an early check in right away. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed for three nights when visiting Disneyland. The room was very clean and the hotel offer valet parking which was good. We were able to walk to the parks in 20 mins which was helpful and the buffet breakfast each day was very good and had a pancake machine which we hadn’t seen anywhere else. This was probably the best free breakfast of our whole west coast road trip.
Manager Response: Dear AlisonH1979,  Thank you for visiting us and for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Express and suites Anaheim Resort for your Disneyland trip! Our location is perfect for a family trip which offers complimentary breakfast in the morning and a small refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave in the room. Our parking fee gives you the option of self parking or valet for the same price. Our pancake machine and our cinnamon rolls are our all time favorite items on our breakfast buffet! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  The Team at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: I was very pleased with my choice of hotels for this Disneyland trip. It’s a couple minutes further (walking) that my last hotel, but the experience was better. It’s roughly a 12 minute walk from the door to Disneyland security. I felt safe walking back by myself at night because of traffic and lighting. The room was comfortable and they are ready to feed a hungry hoard in the mornings. Lobby is spacious and comfortable, and the staff was always friendly and helpful. Parking (valet or self) is $15.
Manager Response: Dear Marmarhar,  Thank you for staying with us! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our location and the close proximity to Disneyland main gate. Our complimentary breakfast is just perfect to start your day before heading to the park. However, I regret that you found the sheets dirty, the rooms layout inadequate, the noise challenges and the parking situation to be less that satisfactory. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you have faced during your stay. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the service level we aim for. Rest assured, your comments will be used for review and actions will be taken accordingly to ensure similar incidents could be avoided.      Again, thank you for staying and we hope you give us another chance to show you how great our hotel is.     Best Regards,    John O  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: This newer hotel was very clean and had great customer service. The valet parking employees were friendly and fast. It was an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland and very close to the interstate, which was convenient. The pool is on the smaller side, but was clean and not crowded. However, it closed at 10:30pm and my kids wanted to swim after we returned from the Parks. Parking was $15 per night, valet or not, and that was the only downside. Overall, this is one of the best hotels we've stayed in at Disneyland and we will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: great hotel and proximity to disneyland
Summary: You are probably looking at this hotel because it seems like it is close to Disneyland but you don't know what that translates to as actually going to the park from the hotel.  So for that biggest question - it is an easy 10 min walk along the sidewalk and crossing the street at one stoplight crosswalk right onto the park.  Awesome proximity.  As for the hotel itself, it seems like it is brand new.  Very clean and new furnishings.  excellent staff and customer service. If you drive a car, there will be a parking fee.......same price to valet as to park yourself. We literally gave the rental to the valet on the night we checked in and didnt look for the car until time to go back home.  easy.  very comfy bed and the squishy/firm selection of pillows  Hotel has good HIEx breakfast
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The best Holiday inn express I ever stayed in
Summary: This place is amazing. I travel a lot and this hotel was clean, looked brand new, staff very helpful and happy, and excellently situated! I was amazed at how comfortable the king bed was and I slept like a baby!! Also quiet rooms unlike some HI's where you can hear the guy in the next room sneeze!  Nice modern lounge area to plug in and work (had a meeting with a colleague there).  Breakfast is the only thing which I think let's down HI's as that would have made this hotel A1, to be able to order eggs etc - here you get the standard cereal etc. I walked to Mimi's Cafe around the corner from the hotel for a higher quality breakfast experience. Wifi also very strong here.  I would definitely bring my family here if we were to go to Disneyland in the future - it's literally 4-5
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was excellent. Big, clean, with a lot of light. Food was great, lot of food available. Great to stay if you visit Disneyland. Staff was really pulite and helpfull (thanks to all of them once more).
Manager Response: Dear Vedran N,  It was our pleasure to have you at our hotel! Thank you for your visit and compliments on our hotel and staff! Great to hear that you and your family enjoyed your visit to Disneyland and that we were able to make it an enjoyable visit overall. We couldn't wait to welcome you back on your next trip to Anaheim!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disney vacation, would come again
Summary: I recently finished a week long stay here with grandparents and a child and would highly recommend to families to come back again #1: Short walk to Disney, ~15min. to the main security gate on a busy, well lit street. There is only a small section when you walk off Harbor past the Courtyard that isn't as busy, well-lite as would be ideal  #2: Large, clean, up to date rooms and Hotel.  The whole family loved it  #3: Staff was very friendly.  They helped me get access to the hotel next door to do laundry when there's was broken  #4: Breakfast bar was great.  That said, I recommend the management opening up a 6am.  6:30am is on the later side for those wanting to start at the parks early.  #5: Several restaurants nearby where you can walk and the Anaheim Garden Walk Mall is a
Manager Response: Dear gbmateo,  Thank you for such an awesome review of our hotel! Our entire team is grateful for the opportunity to host you during your Disneyland vacation. Thank you for your understanding regarding the laundry machine that was unavailable during your stay. Happy to report that all is operational once more! Please give our best regards to your family and hope that you will return and visit us again soon!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Solid hotel that is walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: My wife and myself stayed at this hotel for 3 nights with our one year old in a king bed suite. We wanted to stay somewhere that was walking distance to the parks(It's about a 7-8 minutes walk tops). There are several restaurants within walking distance and you have a fridge, sink, and microwave in your room. The breakfast had the typical cereals, muffins, bagels, yogurts, instant oatmeals, eggs, turkey sausage, sausage links, vegetable omelets, biscuits, fruit and more. One of the things I liked a lot was the hotel has a strict two strike policy if you make two much noise so it is quite quiet at night. That brings me to something that is perplexing to me. All of the king suites are on the freeway side not the disney side. The freeway side is quite noisy. We were so tired at
Manager Response: Dear ScottinLA50,  Thank you for your visit and thorough review of our hotel! We appreciate your honest opinion on your experience. Please know that we value all of our guests' comments and has passed on your review to our design team and our valet manager. We hope to welcome you back for a longer visit next time.  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed with 3 small children for 4 nights. The room was clean with no funny smells. We were very close to the freeway so you could hear the cars, but it didn't bother us. There were a few tiles on the front of the bathroom vanity that had fallen off or were falling off which I thought was strange since it's such a new hotel but not a big deal. There was a good size couch and coffee table in the room too which I liked. Obviously there are a lot of families staying here so the room was pretty kid proof (we had a 6, 3, and 1 year old). I liked that there was a decent amount of space to spread out in and a place to park our big stroller. I think it would be nice if they had some luggage stands. There was a spot for a carry on size bag but our larger bags had to be on the floor.
Manager Response: Dear snowflake170,  Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel! It is always nice to hear our guests' experience as it helps us improve overall operations. We appreciate your compliments and extensive review of our hotel facilities. Glad to hear that you and your family had a great time at Disneyland. We know how exhausting the parks can be!  We hope to welcome you again soon!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed here two nights out of our 17 day vacation traveling across country from Missouri to CA and back again. The valet staff was extremely prompt and very professional and pleasant to work with.   The front desk staff were excellent ambassadors for Holiday Inn Express. They answered all of our questions and were extremely friendly and professional!!   The rooms were superb!! I had a quiet room. It was very clean and the beds were very tightly and neatly made. The floors were clean and so was the bathroom!!! Also they had an ample selection of great channels on the TV and the internet was at pristine speed!!!   We were not Disneyland goers and were there instead to visit family, so I was concerned that being so close to Disney that there would be a lot of noise and children,
Manager Response: Hi, Darlene A  That was quite a road trip you had! We are grateful that you chose our hotel and for your awesome review! Overall we are glad that you slept well and enjoyed your pit stop here in Anaheim. We hope that you'll think of us again should your visit take you back to our area.  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Loved this hotel!  Excellent front desk staff, public areas were extremely clean and room was modern, comfortable and spotless.  A close walk to the Disney attractions.  Hotel has a quiet policy between 10 PM and 7 AM that is well posted and much appreciated.  I wish more hotels did this!  Only complaint was that some breakfast items were not hot enough, but the selection was typical for a Holiday Inn Express and was well stocked.  Very large breakfast area with plenty of seating.  24 hour coffee was always hot and full.  Everyone we encountered at this hotel was extremely nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Hi luv2takepics,  Thank you for an excellent review! We are pleased to hear that you had a great time! Our guests' comfort is our top priority hence the quiet policy. We want all of our guests to relax and enjoy their stay. Thank you again for your visit and hope to see you again soon!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Walk to Disney. Very Nice Hotel
Summary: The location is great for a close walk to Disneyland (less than 10 mins). Friendly staff that recognized IHG status and upgraded to beautiful suite with an entire wall of windows which happened to look perfectly in the direction of the nightly fireworks at Disneyland. Very clean and well kept hotel. Nice, buffet-style, free breakfast with many an array of options both hot and cold. Nice private pool with splash-pad and hot tub. My one, and only, complaint is the parking. $15 per day regardless of hotel status. Overall, a great choice for Disneyland area hotel. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear CobraKy,  We are very thankful for your stay and compliments of our hotel.  Our entire team is grateful for your awesome review and glad that you had a great vacation. We hope that you'll choose our hotel again on your next trip!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice spot for a family visit to Disney
Summary: This  hotel appears to have been newly remodeled.  The rooms are all large, we had 2 double beds as well as a sitting area with a sleeper sofa. It's a little bit of a walk from Disneyland and the main restaurant strip,  but because of the size of the rooms, and the nice breakfast, I still think it is a good choice for families.  I am knocking off one star because 14 people from our group were stuck in one of the elevators for 40 minutes, and then rather than shutting it down or posting a warning, they let people keep taking that elevator.  The next day a big group with small children were stuck in the same elevator for over an hour.  According to the paperwork posted inside, it was over a year past it's inspection due date.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The reviews are spot on with this hotel. It's an excellent location to Disneyland. Easy walk with plenty of restaurants, little shops. etc. close by. We had a Penthouse Suite so we could view the fireworks. We chose it to be close to our family staying close by and it worked out great. The staff were all great and friendly. I have to give a special shout out to Tyler who helped me first on the phone before arrival and then all through our stay as well. He was excellent. We had plenty of room, the place is kept very clean and we enjoyed the breakfast each day.  We would certainly stay again!!
Manager Response: Dear Floridabound2009,  It is our great pleasure to have provided you and your family an awesome hotel stay and service! Your kind comments mean so much to our entire team! Isn't the fireworks view from our Penthouse suites magical?! It is one of our favorites! We are glad to hear that you were able to experience this spectacular view from your room. We hope to see you again on your next visit!  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed there earlier this month during our trip to Disneyland. First off, we did not spend much time there accept to sleep. All in all, a good experience. The walk to Disney is about 7-10 minutes...but after a long day of walking, it seemed longer. The breakfast area is well stocked and big. We had one of the largest rooms in sqft. The maid service was good. We did not like the sliding door in front of the bathroom as it did not give much in a sense of privacy. But, its whats "in" now and this is a newer hotel. We had a stroller delivered and picked up from the hotel without issue. I did wish that breakfast would start at 6AM instead of 0630. When you have your early day at Disney (7AM), you want hurry up and eat and get there. We did have an issue with the second TV in our
Manager Response: Dear HeartDoc76,  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit for the most part, we are saddened to hear that you had an unresolved issue regarding the TV. We sincerely apologize for this omission on our part. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so we can continue to improve our service. We hope to welcome you back in the future so that we may provide a better experience.  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Excellence Service from Front Desk Agent
Summary: After checking in, we found a small minor setback within our room. I want to commend Front Desk Agent Nick (Friday, 4/21) for his quality hospitable service; and having us upgraded to an awesome suite. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Jed F,  Thank you so much for your review! We are very pleased to hear that Nick was able to turn the minor setback your experienced and made it better for you! We appreciate your understanding and graciousness. Nick truly is a great at what he does and has a passion for assisting our guests to have an exceptional stay. We'll pass on your compliments to Nick and thank you again for your stay! We hope you will visit us again.  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Room was big and hotel was clean. Service was good and staff was helpful. Very convenient and close to Disneyland. Onsite laundry was very convenient. Breakfast was simple but good enough for us. Overall, it was one of the best HIE we've stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear Asl154,  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you for granting us a "great hotel" compliment! We are very honored and humbled by your kind words. We're glad that you were able to use all of our services such as the onsite laundry. Nothing like having clean clothes upon returning from your vacation, right? Have a great week and hope to see you on your next trip!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great property a short drive, or slightly long walk, from Disneyland
Summary: Took a spontaneous trip to the Mouse and stayed on this property for two nights. They advertise they are within walking distance, but while that may be the case most families wont want to add a 30-45 min walk, each way, on top of the amount of walking they will be doing at the parks.   Price is fantastic especially for the area. Rooms are spacious, we fit 4 comfortably. Parking lot is a bit small and could be tough to find depending on time of day. Otherwise I highly recommend this property, especially if planning on spending a few days at the Happiest Place on Earth.
Manager Response: Dear Rtrizzo,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. Loved to hear that you chose us for your spontaneous trip to Disneyland! Aren't spontaneous trips the BEST?! We appreciate your compliments and would love to have you again on your next impromptu visit to the house of mouse!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We had two rooms on Disney side for five nights. Could not have been happier with our accommodations. Everything was very clean in the room as well as the breakfast area. Staff and valet were very friendly. Only a 10 minute walk to Disney. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello marksmen1,  Thank you for a great review! We loved hearing that our location worked well for your Disneyland trip. Thank you for complimenting our team and breakfast! We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: So Clean and Close to Disney
Summary: Loved this hotel! So clean. Great breakfast. Staff is friendly and helpful. Disney is in walking distance. Will stay here again. Hope to get a room on the Disney side next time. The other side of the hotel is next to a busy highway. A little loud.
Manager Response: Dear Tina H,  Thank you for loving our hotel! We aim to provide our guests with an enjoyable visit all around. We appreciate your kind words toward our staff! On your next visit, please do not hesitate to provide us your room location request and we'll do our best to fulfill them for you. See you again on your next visit!  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New hotel, the reception staff and car valets were all friendly and helpful, rooms were really nice as hotel is fairly new, only a 10 minute walk from Disney. We ordered food in from Panda House - hotel had menus, it was excellent !
Manager Response: Dear Andrew N,  Thank you for your stay and hotel review. We always love to hear back from our guests and thrilled that you had an excellent time. Our hotel is centrally located in the Anaheim Resort and fortunate to be surrounded by numerous and varied choices for dining. We hope that you get to try them all on your return visit!  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: What a great value for this area
Summary: Really taken back by what Holiday Inn  Express is offering up.  Really great rooms, reasonable price and breakfast.  The Staff was friendly and very helpful. This hotel is in a resort area but a really great find for business travelers. I will certainly look for this these properties in the future.
Manager Response: Dear scottcburns,  Wow! Thank you for such a great review! We are ecstatic to hear that you loved our hotel enough to look for Holiday Inn Express for your trips. We appreciate your loyalty! It was our pleasure  to be your home during this trip!   Until next time,   Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Large comfy suites and good location
Summary: Large clean suites with plenty of shelves and drawers. Useful kitchenette...fridge, microwave and Keurig. Good sized bathroom, plenty of counter space. Very comfortable beds and the sofa bed was ok. No make-up mirror and lack of hooks/towel rail are the only negatives. We spent 4 nights here and were pleased with everything. Friendly staff, good breakfast with lots of seating and nice large lobby area with tv. Valet service is swift and convenient. We spent an extra day at Disney on the day we checked out. We had to pay the daily $15 fee for leaving our car there for the additional 6 hours. Hotel is less than 15 min walk to Disney turnstiles. I recommend Mimi's cafe nearby for yummy food. We would stay at this hotel again if we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear lovehotbeaches,  Thank you so much for an awesome review of our hotel! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit and had a magical time overall! More so, we are happy to hear that you would stay with us again! We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Yours in hospitality, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great family hotel for Disneyland stay
Summary: Very good family hotel. Excellent location. 8-10 minute walk to front gates of Disneyland. Reasonabley good food choices nearby. Free breakfast in hotel of good varity. Decent outside heated pool and hot tub. Good TV channels, Good beds, mini fridege and microwaves. Nice rooms in a newer hotel makes it all a very good value. One downside, while you are close to the park you will not see the fireworks at night. The other hotel next door blocks any view.
Manager Response: Dear Slyce714,  It is always great to hear back from our guests! Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! We trust that you had an equally magical time at Disneyland and had an uneventful trip back home! Next time if you are able, please choose our Penthouse suites. These rooms have windows that provides a 180- degree, stunning views of Disneyland fireworks when available. We hope that you will visit us again soon!  Yours in hospitality,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday Inn for 3 nights in February and loved it! We were 3 adults staying in a 2 queen bed (enchanted) suite and it was perfect with the pull out sofa bed. The rooms are a decent size with enough room for everyone and our luggage. The hotel is new so everything feels clean and welcoming. The breakfast is included and offers anything you could need to get your day started. It's about a 10-15 min walk to the gates of Disneyland with lots of families and people walking back and forth at all times it was very safe.  The reason I only gave 4 stars is because we had a room with an adjoining door and on the second night we could hear everything our neighbor was saying as if they were in the room with us. On the last night of our stay someone got checked into the room at
Manager Response: Hi, Tiffany Y!  We are pleased to hear that you had a perfect Disneyland trip! Thank you for your review and choosing our hotel.  We sincerely apologize that you had a hiccup with the adjoining rooms and neighbor guests. Please do ask us next time for non-adjoining rooms. We look forward to your return!  Yours in hospitality,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great stay with family for a visit to Disneyland!!
Summary: Had an extremely great experience and stay here for our trip to Disneyland. Property is brand new and it shows, our room was pristine and spacious!! All areas of the hotel from the pool to the breakfast areas were very clean and well-maintained. Everyone from the housekeeping staff to the front desk were great, We are glad we took Tyler's advice and took Uber to LAX, it ended up being very economical. Will definitely stay here again for future visits!
Manager Response: Dear globetrottermin,  Hello from Anaheim! We miss you already! Thank you for your visit and for choosing our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you had an excellent stay and a magical trip to the Happiest Place on Earth! We'll make sure to give Tyler your thanks for the transportation advice. We are glad that you made it back home safely and wish you the best week ahead!  Until next time,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We had he queen suite rooms which were very spacious and clean. Small fridge with microwave and Keurig coffee machine in room was very useful. Newly remodeled. Very comfortable beds.  Breakfast room was very nice and plenty of room. Nice hot breakfast buffet was included. Make your own pancakes, scrambled eggs, veggie omelette (pre-made), sausage, breads, pastries etc. made for a great start to the day.   Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Pool was heated - even enough for kids on a chilly February day.....small but nice and clean. Small "sprinkler" area for kids to play in water area.
Manager Response: Hello, shansmith110!  It is always a pleasure to hear back from our guests regarding their experience at our hotel. Thank you for choosing us and taking the time to provide a review of your visit! We are pleased to hear that the Enchanted suite worked well for your family and enjoyed our expanded breakfast selections daily. For us Southern Californians, anything below 80 degrees is chilly! Glad to hear that you had a blast with our kids splash area and heated pool. We hope to be able to welcome you back in the near future!  Until next time,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Hotel staff were extremely friendly, and helpful with any questions I had. The parking is $15.00 regardless if you use the valet service or not. I was really happy with valet. We stayed Sunday and checked out Monday. Upon checkout the valet took our bags to the car and told us when we return the car will be ready to go, I was impressed with them lugging the suitcase and other stuff to the car. Disneyland was absolutely crazy on a nice sunny day in February, wall to wall people. But Monday was great. Truly is their slowest day of the week. Short 5-10 minute easy walk, and it was well lit when we left Sunday night. With the other holiday inns in the area, will definitely pick this one to come back too. Nice breakfast buffet too.  Also ask for a room away from the freeway, much
Manager Response: Hi, Linda S!  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We'll make sure that our Valet team is recognized for providing you with service that you raved about! We are most excited to hear that you will choose our hotel again over others in the area! Thank you for your loyalty to our brand and we cannot wait to welcome you back!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed here for four nights with our 11 and 4 year old boys.  They loved it and our 4 year old thought it was awesome that they had a pull out sofa bed just for him!  The hotel itself is very nice and extremely clean.  What really made the stay outstanding was the staff from the parking attendants to the front desk staff they bent over backwards to make sure that our stay was great.  If we ever get to go back to Disneyland we will stay here again!  They also have a three strike rule between 10pm and 7am so you are ensured a great and quiet night.
Manager Response: Dear Loren W,  Wow! We loved to hear that our team made a difference to make your Disneyland vacation special and magical. High praises from our guests such as yourself makes our day around here, so thank you in return! We truly have the best guests!! Please come and visit us again soon!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Great hotel. Highly recommend it. We stayed 3 nights for a trip to Disneyland with our 3 and 5 year olds. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Valet remembered us every time but still checked IDs for safety. My 3 and 5 year olds had no problem with the walk from Disneyland to the hotel. One of the days we decided to drive to Disneyland instead of walk since it was supposed to rain at the end of the day and it took 3x as long to get to the parking garage, park, walk to the tram, walk through downtown Disney and get to the gate. Walking from the hotel is so much better/faster. We even walked back to hotel from the park around 3pm and let the kids nap and eat and then walked back that evening for another round of fun. It was perfect. The included breakfast was great. Coffee
Manager Response: Hello, 4xST  We are incredibly humbled by your high praises regarding your visit to our hotel! Our entire team from valet to front desk to housekeeping and maintenance are grateful for you recognizing their hard work to make your stay magical! Thank you for choosing our hotel and we cannot wait to welcome you on your next visit!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Special treatment and a great location
Summary: My husband and I stayed two nights here last weekend, and we had such a great time. Some friends set up our vacation, and they chose this hotel for us because of its close proximity to Disneyland. We loved being so close to the park, and the special treatment I received on my birthday. Our friends called to ask if the hotel staff could do something special for my birthday, so we came back and found the room decorated with balloons, a happy birthday sign, and a bag of chocolate. The staff was wonderfully friendly!
Manager Response: Hi, Tracey S!  Happy Birthday again! Thank you for spending your special day with us and for providing a review of your visit! It was our pleasure to put a bit of magic and pixie dust on your stay and we're glad to hear that you had a great time!  We hope that you and your family will think of us again for future stays here in Anaheim!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Our new favorite hotel for Disneyland!
Summary: Pros: Great stay! Excellent value. Friendly staff. Clean comfortable large room with nice, well thought out amenities. Very quiet. We appreciated the "2 strike" noise policy posted at elevators. USB ports on the nightstand outlets offered plenty of convenient charging options for devices. Breakfast exceeded expectations with offerings and service. Staff was constantly replenishing and cleaning up at breakfast. Perfect location - 10 minute walk from main gate, so no need to wait for a shuttle. Plenty of self parking was available during our stay during the off season.  Cons: This is very minor. Guest laundry has only one washer and one dryer. We tried three different times to wash clothes and it was in use every time. We ended up purchasing additional clothes for our youngest
Manager Response: Hello RoadtripofMommyof4!  We're glad that we were one of your stop for your road trip. Thank you for your stay and compliments of your entire experience with us! We are honored to be your new favorite Disneyland hotel! For future visits, if you find that our guest laundry is busy, just let us know so we can provide you with other options. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Nice new hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. Love HIE for the large breakfast and rooms that sleep 6 for our large family (4 kids, 2 adults). Hotel is clean. Pool was heated and nice for the kids to use on our 70 degree and sunny day in January.   Hotel is right on I-5 so lots of road noise. Front desk had earplugs. Other than that, very nice place to stay for families heading to Disney.
Manager Response: Hello Nealybob73,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Disneyland vacation.  We are thrilled to hear that you loved our spacious suites and breakfast! We may have been getting much needed rain here in California but it sounds like you came on a sunny day!  We appreciate you visit and hope to see you again!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Absolute Gem!  Best staff, great location, spacious, clean, comfortable rooms. Complimentary, good breakfast.
Summary: Just returned from our stay at Anaheim Holiday Inn and it was absolutely first rate. For my work I have had the opportunity to stay in the finest of hotels and the Anaheim Holiday Inn is even better than the best hotels I have stayed in. The rooms were spacious, spotless and most importantly the staff was the friendliest I have ever encountered. They all made you feel at home and so welcome in their establishment. The complimentary breakfast was great. Lots of selection, very clean, tasty and abundant food. The restaurant had spacious seating, was very pleasant and although there were many families there the area was not noisy. The room and hotel was quiet and very comfortable. The hotel is situated just a short walk to the Disneyland gate and there are several restaurants on
Manager Response: Dear Joy H,  We are overwhelmed and humbled by your high praise regarding your visit to our hotel! There are no sweeter words  for us to hear  you were pleased with your overall stay and you felt cared for!   Thank you for choosing our hotel, your review and recommendation! We will treasure it and hope to see you again on your next visit!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We booked an Enchanted 2 Queen Suite, which easily sleeps 4 with 2 queen beds and a foldout couch bed. It was so quiet and the beds were excellent. We probably got the best sleep we've ever had in a hotel. Breakfast options are enough to have something different every morning for a few days. From here, it's about an 8-10 minute walk to Disneyland. So convenient not to have to take a shuttle! Shower had good water pressure and it was nice having a tub and a quiet fridge. We could see the top of Space Mountain from our room and apart from the Disneyland fireworks, we didn't hear any outside noise the whole night. Another plus, towels are provided at the pool. This hotel posts a 2 strike noise policy at the elevators, which I love! Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello JHunter26,  It was our pleasure to be your home away from home during your Disneyland vacation! We are excite to hear that our location and accommodations suited your needs.  Our goal is to provide a comfortable and restful sleep for each and every guest. Everyone needs their rest to tackle the theme parks! We'll hold you to your promise and cannot wait to welcome you back! Thank you for your stay!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My wife and 2 kids chose to stay here as opposed to the Disneyland Resort and were not disappointed.   Checked in and learned all guests must valet their vehicle. $15/day but that was no problem. I came and went a few times over the next 3 days and the valet literally ran to my vehicle every time.   The room had 2 queen beds and a sleeper couch. Plenty of room for 2 adults and probably up to 3-4 kids. Satellite TV, WiFi, nice bathroom. Room was in nice condition and we had plenty of pillows (a deal breaker for me and hotels).   Complimentary breakfast buffet starting at 6:30. Wide range of hot items, cold cereal, eggs prepared 3 different ways, bagels, fruits (which are wrapped and can be taken), etc.   Could walk from the hotel to the security check gates at Disneyland in 20
Manager Response: Hello Benjamin W!  It was a pleasure to hear from you regarding your stay! Our entire team is grateful for your recognition of our work and truly ecstatic that you enjoyed your visit! Your very thorough review about our amenities and Disneyland will be much appreciated by our future guests. Thank you for choosing our hotel and hope to welcome you back soon!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Good for first-timers going to Disneyland. Close to the parks and makes good time for a family with a short time. Nice hot tub as well. As said before, Great for Families who just want a magical time. Amazing hotel.
Manager Response: Dear kaendyreviews,  It was a pleasure to host you and your family during your visit to Disneyland! Glad to hear that it was magical!! Our team strives to provide a comfortable and enjoyable visit for each of our guests and pleased to hear that we accomplished that for you. Thank you for your amazing comments and we look forward to your next visit!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My family went to Disneyland and we stayed at this property. We rented 6 rooms and this is a very clean and friendly property. Great breakfast and easy access to Disneyland. Probably a 10-13 minute walk. We needed to rent a motor wheelchair. The people at the front set us up and gave us a $5.00 discount coupon. The chair was delivered to hotel and also able to drop it off their. Great property! Great people! Good value! They do charge for parking, but it is valet parking.! I feel it was worth every dollar! This will be my hotel in the future!!!
Manager Response: Hello, Robin B!  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your visit to Anaheim! It sounds like you had quite a reunion with a bunch of family and friends! We are pleased to hear that you felt well cared for during your stay and to us that is mission accomplished!  We truly appreciate that you chose our hotel and found us of great value. We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Enjoyed our stay here, nice rooms, generous in size. The one thing that could be better is the air conditioning. Loved the restaurant downstairs, really appreciated having it close by, good  food and lovely staff. Would recommend this place to anyone going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear gcrleigh,  It was our pleasure to be your home base for your most recent trip to Disneyland! Thank you for choosing and reviewing our hotel! We are ecstatic to hear that you LOVED our hotel, enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and had a great time with the staff! Mission accomplished for us!  We hope to welcome you back and we are ever grateful for the stamp of approval and recommendation!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We took a quick trip to Disneyland and decided to stay at this Holiday Inn Express. It's new, even smells new when you walk into the room. Breakfast is your typical Holiday Inn fare. The beds were comfortable. The rooms were quiet, for the most part. They have signs posted saying quiet time is from 10 pm to 7 am, and people seemed to honor that but they are definitely noisy (letting kids run down the halls, banging on doors to other rooms, and slamming doors) as soon as it hits 7 am. Everyone is nice. You pay for parking. It's $15 whether you self park or valet park. I highly recommend valet. The valet attendants were nice. There was one that was slacking a bit but it was fine. He was always in the back room. You are about a 15 minute walk from the main gate of Disneyland. It's
Manager Response: Dear debbiedavemesa,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your quick trip to Disneyland. It was our pleasure to be your home away from home while on vacation. We are super thrilled to hear that for the most part your visit was comfortable. Please know that we have forwarded your comments to our Valet Manager to address  the Valet service you received. We sincerely apologize for the lack of attention from one of our own as it certainly is not the norm. We hope that we will have an opportunity to make a better impression on this area on your next visit. We wish you and your family a Happy New Year!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Not a great place for families, light sleepers, or if you want to use the hot tub.
Summary: I was very disappointed with this hotel. Here are my reasons why. 1. Open porn channels. REALLY? I do not want my kids to happen upon porn and I do not know any families that do.  If you are a family friendly hotel then do away with the porn channel or at the least advise families and give them the option to block it. For this 1 reason alone, I will never return to this hotel nor will I reccommend it. 2. Hot tub water was extremely dirty.  You would come out smelling like dirty feet. 3. Bathroom has a sliding door that can not be locked. Terrible for privacy. 4. The noise from I-5 in the room was horrendous.  I felt like my bed was in the middle of the freeway.  Terrible sleep. 5. Was strongly encouraged to pay for Valet parking and was told that it was hard to find  parking
Manager Response: Hello VelocityToursNTvl,  Thank you for your stay and the opportunity to address your concerns during your visit. I  sincerely apologize that your visit was less than perfect due to some unfortunate circumstances during your stay. As a parent myself, I understand your concerns regarding channels that are inappropriate for young children. I am greatly disturbed by this and would like to know what those channels were so that I can further look into your concerns.  Our hotel does not offer adult channels or pay-per-view options that feature such channels. Our list of channels are expanded and Brand approve. We selected these channels carefully to provide our guests with endless hours of entertainment but still remain sensitive to the fact that majority of our guests are families with young children. Our state of the art televisions in our room are equipped with Parental Controls as well. If it is not much of an imposition, please contact me back at the hotel so that I may look into your concerns. Please know as well that your concerns regarding housekeeping has been addressed. We strive to adhere to a high standard of cleanliness and are known for guests raving about the cleanliness of our hotel and rooms. I sincerely apologize that you experienced otherwise. I hope that you will give us another opportunity to make a better impression on your next visit. I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely, Rachel L. General Manager

Summary: Excellent front desk staff, both helpful and friendly.  Our room was clean and quiet even with families in the rooms surrounding us.  The breakfast was actually wonderful quality with a large variety of selections.  The walk to Disney was around 7/8 minutes to the Disneyland street entrance and another 7/8 minutes to the actual entrance to the parks.  We walked back to the hotel each evening around 11:30pm and there were quite a few families walking around also which made us feel safer.  It was a nice area to be around.  We actually took a kiddo nap break from the parks each afternoon and it was a quick enough walk to do so easily.  Many people around were scrambling for busses and it was nice to not have to worry about catching one and unloading all our gear from our double
Manager Response: Hello, Jenny L!  It was our pleasure to be of service during your most recent visit to our hotel! We are pleased to hear that our location was perfect for your visit to Disneyland. It does help a lot that we are a short walking distance to Disneyland for those long days at the park. Thank you for your visit and we hope to be able to welcome you back to our hotel soon!  Happy Holidays from our family to yours!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Look No Further!! Excellent Hotel, Excellent Amenities, Nice and Close to Disneyland and A REAL HOTEL!!
Summary: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort Area   1411 S Manchester Ave, Anaheim, CA 92802, USA  What a great hotel!!   This hotel is a 10 minute walk from stepping upside the hotel to arriving at the security lines at Disneyland, and that’s while pushing a stroller.   From the entrance of the hotel to the entrance of Disneyland is a wider than average sidewalk which is backed off from the road which makes walking to Disneyland or California Adventure land both safe and easy.  My wife picked the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort area (1411 S Manchester Ave, Anaheim, CA 92802, USA) based on the reviews, and so I hope my review will be helpful for others as well. I highlight the address because there is another Holiday Inn which might pop up in your searches. Though I’m
Manager Response: Dear Donny C,  WOW! What a very thorough review! Thank you, thank you from our entire team! It was  our pleasure to serve you during your visit. Your kind words regarding our hotel and team was truly humbling. We work hard to provide our guests with incomparable hospitality. It warms our heart to know that our guests are happy and appreciate our efforts! I will make sure to share your wonderful comments to our team. Our future guests will appreciate how thorough your review was!  Have a magical holiday season!  Best regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Fantastic Base to Visit Disneyland From
Summary: The Holiday Inn Express and Suites in Anaheim is one of the newest hotels located near Disneyland. The breakfast at the hotel is excellent and the rooms are very spacious. The best part is the fact that it is less than 15 minutes to walk around the block and into the heart of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Darren_C_Thomas,  It was a pleasure to serve you during your stay! Thank you for an awesome review and rating of our hotel! We are glad to hear that it was perfect for your trip to Disneyland! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Have a magical Holiday season!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great option for a Disneyland visit with kids
Summary: We stayed here with our 5 and 7 yr old sons and had a great time.   The rooms were quite large and comfortable- we had two queen beds then a couch area that could have been used as a bed if needed. We also had a little kitchen area with a fridge, microwave, coffee maker and some cabinet space. The only thing that was awkward was the bathroom door was right up against the entry door so you had to be careful not to bump doors.  Breakfast is served each morning from 6:30-9:30 every morning and they really had a nice selection. The offered scrambled eggs, sausage patties and sausage and biscuits every morning along with oatmeal, cereals, yogurts, fresh fruit, toast, bagels and cinnamon rolls. They had free coffee/tea/hot chocolate available around the clock.   The hotel is about a
