Manager Response: Hi AustinGal2,  We appreciate your review and comments regarding your visit! Thank you for choosing our hotel during your trip to Disneyland.  We are so very pleased that you and your little ones had a great time and our hotel was a great fit.  For future visits ( and we hope that you do), both valet and self park is available for the same fee. You may choose what will be more convenient during your stay.  From our family to yours, we wish you a happy and safe Holiday Season!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We have stayed at the Anaheim Fairfield Inn a few times in the past.  The HI Express, next door (facing I-5) is hands down superior.  What it lacks (an extra 5 minute walk to Disneyland when compared to Fairfield) is more than made up with a great free breakfast, better nightly rates, and the comfortable rooms.  The noise from I-5 was not noticeable to me but our AC was on most the time at night.  Front desk staff accommodated us quickly with extra pillows and blankets.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi, Mike N!  We appreciate your review and rating of our hotel! We know that there are many hotel choices in the area and we are grateful that you chose ours. Our team extends our gratitude  for recognizing our hard work and hope that you visit us again in the near future. From our family to yours, we wish you a Magical Holiday season!  Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Great hotel, very clean, not too close to Disney that it's wild and crazy but close enough for a rental car to go enjoy the day. Nice and clean. Staff was super friendly. We also seen a Disney shuttle and airport shuttle service.
Manager Response: Hi Kat-from-Calgary,  It is our pleasure to provide you with an awesome visit! Thank you for your compliments on the hotel and our team. We appreciate the kind words and hope that you'll choose our hotel again on your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Enjoyed our first night in Anaheim at this hotel.  Fabulous location, tuck off the main road so much less foot traffic. It does back on to the Freeway but we didn't hear a thing.  Our room was spacious, and the bed so comfortable.  10-minute walk to Disneyland.  Staff are very helpful and friendly. Check-in/out was a breeze. (We did accidentally get charged twice however which created a bit of a panic as it meant a wee bit less spending money for the rest of the trip-but it has now been sorted)
Manager Response: Hello Alicem2,  Thank you for choosing our hotel during your most recent visit to Anaheim! We love to hear back from our guests and glad that you enjoyed the facility and had a great time with our team.  We do sincerely apologize about the billing mishap and thank you for letting us know that it has been sorted out to your satisfaction.  We look forward to your next visit! Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Our room was good sized with a comfy king bed, desk and small couch with table. Also had a sink, refrig and microwave and Keurig. The hotel has excercise area, laundry area and heated pool. Hotel was new last spring and is well kept with helpful staff. We used valet, and they were great. The breakfast was the typical Holiday Inn Express. Remember that this is close to Disney and there are lots of families staying and the breakfast area is often packed with kids.
Manager Response: Hello wineanddine32,  We appreciate the review and kind words regarding your visit! Thank you for choosing our hotel over others and glad that you loved our room and the service we provided. It is our goal to provide our guests with a comfortable and relaxing stay and we are pleased to hear that we delivered that for you! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit! Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: The hotel room was nice, comfortable bed and nice staff.  My only problem is the accounting process.  When I checked in, my confirmation was under one name with me as a secondary guest.  I asked that my room be changed to my name, using my IHG Reward Club number, and gave my credit card to associate for my room.  The front desk manager assured me he would update my room. Day two, I asked to confirm the changes had been made and I was assured all was all in order.  At check out, my VISA was charged however, I did not get the IHG Reward Club points. When I called to follow up, I was told the reservation had not been updated and someone else received my points.  I will never allow anyone else to make my reservations for me again, because IHG is not capable of dealing with business
Manager Response: Dear Amy R.  Thank you for your stay and review of your visit. We sincerely apologize that your stay was less than perfect due to the issue with your points. We value your loyalty to our brand and would like the opportunity to rectify the mix up regarding your points. Please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel and I will be happy to assist you. I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely, Rachel L. General Manager

Summary: Stayed one night after a long flight from Sydney Australia. Checked in around 8:30am room not ready as expected so spent a few hours in Disneyland. The staff were great and helpful. Returned at 2pm and got to the room it was nice and clean and well worth the price. Would be the first place I would look for the next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Tinny66,  Thank you for choosing our hotel as your home away from home during your visit to Disneyland! We trust that you returned home safely!  We appreciate your kind words and thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our staff and hotel! We hope that you will choose us again on your next trip to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We had a great time here. Excellent rooms, great pool, very clean and such friendly staff. The hotel is very new and modern and the breakfasts were great too. A pleasure to stay here. Will be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn K,  Thank you, thank you for a "fabulous" review! We are so because of guests like you! Our entire team looks forward to your next visit and hopes to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We just returned home from a wonderful five night stay at the Holiday Express. We were here to celebrate our son's 40th birthday at Disneyland and the staff here at the hotel did everything possible to make our stay a most enjoyable experience. We especially want to thank Akul for going above and beyond our expectations!  He was knowledgeable and helpful when we needed information, and we always looked forward to seeing him with his cheerful demeanor.  Before we left for home, he gave our special needs son a birthday gift bag, a gesture that touched our hearts immensely!  Thank you Akul and Holiday Express for helping make this a most memorable family vacation!❤️
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great experience at this Holiday Inn Express.  Rooms were very clean and spacious.  Beds were very comfortable and staff was very friendly and accommodating.   About a 10-15 min walk to the gates and very accessible.  Would definitely stay here again.   Pricing was reasonable considering the surrounding hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great experience at our hotel! We appreciate your kind words! It means a lot to our team who works hard to please all of our guests. We will hold you to your promise of staying with us again!  Until next time, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Staff members where great and very helpful . Great location for Disney only a five min walk . Close to restaurants .  Breakfast bit disappointing not many options , but still enjoyable.  Room was clean and very modern . Great for family's
Manager Response: Dear Donna D,  Hello and thank you for your review! Our entire team is pleased to hear that you found our location perfect for your trip to Disneyland. We hope that you had fun at the park! We look forward to your next trip!  Best regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: I booked the Penthouse Suite for my family of 5 for a 4 night stay, eight months ago.  The listing says that it accommodates 6 people, after a few months I called to see how does it fit 6 people when there are only two beds, and the very long couch is curved.  I was told that it only accommodates 4, and I could not have 5 stay there.  They offered to give me a much smaller room without the views and perks of the penthouse for $20 per night credit.  My family was so excited about having the fireworks views since we will be arriving after dark on our first night.  I could do better than $20 off by rebooking it myself.  So basically I was offered nothing for their error.  (Site still says accommodates 6, and I made them aware 3 months ago.) This is actually my second time trying to
Manager Response: Dear SHARKBITE,  Thank you for your review and feedback regarding your visit. I sincerely apologize that you had an issue with the penthouse bed configuration. It is never our intention to upset our valued guests such as yourself. Please know that we have addressed your concerns and corrected our site information regarding this room type. If you are ever in our area again and in need of a hotel room, please call me directly and I will be more than happy to assist you. We truly value you comments and welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Sincerely, Rachel L.

Summary: Had a king room with a pull out couch which was not comfortable for our grown son. They immediately gave us a room with 2 queen beds. The breakfast was very good with hot eggs, bacon or ham, pancakes and fruit, cereal , pastries, toast etc. We drove to Disney in our motor home and we were able to have a parking space reserved for easily exit everyday. It was not too busy.
Manager Response: Dear Ken H,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns regarding the sofa bed in our King Suite. We're glad that the Enchanted Suite with the double queen beds met your expectations and your son was comfortable. You just missed the summer crowd so the park was not as crowded as it was during July and August. Great to hear that your were able to move around in your mobile home.  We hope that you will choose our hotel again on your next trip to Anaheim!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Wanted to like this place, but after a disappointing stay, I can't recommend this hotel to other TripAdvisor users.  However there were some positives and I'll start there:   Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. Check in was easy and staff were helpful.  Within walking distance to disneyland.  And now for the negatives...  Room was VERY noisey, made it hard to sleep. The hotel is right next to the freeway and the sound of cars/trucks on the freeways is so loud, even in the middle of the night. Come prepared with ear plugs.  Breakfast buffet was just plain gross. I'm not usually a picky eater but the only thing palatable in the entire breakfast was the yogurt. The hotel could really improve the breakfast options.  Room cleanliness was just ok, strong urine smell in
Manager Response: Dear Kelrich1,  Thank you for your review. While we are glad that you found our staff to be very friendly and helpful, we are saddened that you were disappointed with other aspects of your visit.  Rest assured that we'll look into all of your concerns. We value your feedback and welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Sincerely, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: we just got back from a 7 night stay there and I just had to share it was amazing!!  It's a new hotel, opened in February so everything is still shiney and new feeling.   The staff were so nice, totally above and beyond.   It was about a ten minute walk to the park which you can cross and walk alone (not in the pack of people) on harbor.   The best part about the hotel is free breakfast!  The downside is if you have a car they charge to park and the towels were a bit rough.   This hotel really met all of our wants so I had to share. :)  We will be back next year!
Manager Response: Hello Carmen R!  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review of our hotel! Our brand new and shiny hotel appreciates your kind words! The team is overwhelmed by your comments and truly appreciate them! We cannot wait to welcome you back next year!   Until next time,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Trying a new hotel - so close...
Summary: We travel.  A lot. We are pretty easy going, but expect quality and value. We stay in wide range of price points, from inexpensive to the Four Seasons and the Ritz. The LO LOVES hotels. First of all, make sure you have the correct Holiday Inn, there's like 4 of them around. This is a pretty new property near Disneyland. The lobby is clean and new.  There's only valet parking and you have to pay for it.  The room (king with sofa bed) is clean and comfortable, if a bit expensive for what I expect from IHG. It was quiet for the LO to nap. The weird thing about this hotel is that there is no tub/shower, only a shower. It was tough because the LO only wants to take a bath.  The breakfast is surprisingly good.  I've eaten at a lot of Holiday Inn's and I prefer not to eat anything but
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your visit and review! We are glad that you chose our hotel for your trip to Disneyland. Our Wonderland Suite(King) comes with a shower only. For your next visit, please try our Enchanted Suite as these comes with a tub/shower combo. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our yummy breakfast. Our breakfast team works hard to provide our guests with fresh options and great selection of hot and cold items.  Thank you again for your comments and hope to see you again!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel is in good walking distance to the parks about a 10 minute stroll. It's reasonably new so it is very clean and up to date. Breakfast is good and included all you can eat. The pancakes more than satisfied the kids. Staff are friendly and the choice of pillows is great, I always find it hard in hotels to get good pillows but this hotel has plenty to choose from.   Only complaint was the aircon is a bit fidely it's either off or cold.  Pool is sufficient as well.  Let's be honest the only reason you are here is for Disneyland and this hotel is amongst so many but if your looking for a cheaper option which includes breakfast it ticks all the boxes. We would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Nathan B,  Thank you for your review. We are grateful for the feedback and glad that you liked our hotel specially our pillows. We provide a soft and firm options on all our beds and received many requests from guests asking where they can purchase them for their home. We sincerely apologize that the room temperature gave you some difficulty. On your next visit, if it still an issue, please do not hesitate to let us know so we can address it for you. We are looking forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We recently just finished a 6 night stay at this hotel and loved it. As others have noted, it is very close to Disneyland - about a 10 minute walk to the entrance.  This hotel is new, but beyond being new, it is very smartly designed. The lobby is lovely, much nicer than you would expect from an express - comfortable and stylish - with designer furniture and tasteful elements.  Rebecca checked us in and was fast, efficient and friendly.  Our room -  ( a junior suite I believe - was great). Clean, with stylish furniture and an ultra cool bathroom with backlit large mirror and glass door shower.  Housekeeping was great - and the bed was super comfortable.  We faced the freeway, and although there was some freeway noise it was minimal  and certainly not an issue.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Hi, adamyyc!  Gosh! Thank you, thank you for your very detailed review! Our entire team is extremely grateful for your kind words and we'll certainly pass your compliments to Rebecca. We're glad that you were able to experience all our amenities and relaxed during your vacation. You both came at a great time and missed most of the summer crowd at Disneyland and the weather was nice.  Thank you for your stamp of approval and for recommending us to other travelers! We cannot wait to see you on your next trip to Anaheim!  Yours in hospitality, Rachel and Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel walking distance of Disney
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights whilst visiting Disney. We absolutely loved it. The front lobby staff are really helpful, the rooms are exceptional with a huge bathroom and tv. It's location means you can visit Disney without a car and it is only a few blocks from outlet shops. Restaurants are within walking distance too. The valet parking guys are brilliant with travel information and information on where to eat etc. Breakfast is included in your stay and this again is plentiful with lots of choice which is filled up constantly. There is also a pool and gym. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay here.
Manager Response: Dear catherineh625,  We appreciate your review and extremely glad that you loved the four days you spent with us! Our entire team thanks you for your wonderful comments! It warms our hearts to hear that you enjoyed all aspects of the hotel.  We hope that you will visit us again the next time you take a trip to Anaheim!  Many thanks, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for our trip to Disneyland.  When we checked in, the front desk staff was very nice, they even gave us a room upgrade since we were platinum members.  The rooms are very clean spacious and has everything you would need including a fridge and microwave.  Location was excellent.  You can easily walk to Disneyland.  It is as convenient as staying at the Disneyland Hotel at 1/5th the price.  It is a newer hotel so you don't have to stay in a dump like some of the motels around the park.  I considered not writing a review because I wanted to keep this place a secret, but the people here are great and they deserve a good review.
Manager Response: Dear cuaman,  Thank you for your stay and for reviewing our hotel! We are grateful that you chose our hotel for your Disneyland trip. We hope that you were able to enjoy the park to the fullest during your visit. It looks like you just missed the summer crowd!  Thank you for your loyalty to our brand of hotels. We truly value your business and congratulate you on your Platinum Elite status!   We hope to be able to welcome you back to our hotel on your next trip!  Many thanks, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Recently stayed here. The front desk staff were very friendly. Check-in went smoothly.   The hotel is a quick walk to Disneyland and there are numerous restaurants around the area to enjoy.   Rooms are large and clean.   My only disappointment was the breakfast area had no cinnamon rolls due to an out of order warmer. Hopefully one is on its way!   Overall great stay and I will be staying here again for my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Hi, BizzleRN  Thank you for reviewing our hotel with a perfect rating despite not having any cinnamon rolls. We apologize that we were unable to satisfy your cravings. We are happy to report that  the warmers are back in service and the little elves that magically bake these yummy cinnamon rolls are back from their siesta while the warmers were being serviced! We look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,   Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel is just a 5 minute walk to Disneyland.  The proximity is great for families with young children.  We even had a front row seat to the Disney fireworks from our hotel room window.  It does face the Santa Ana Freeway, but you can not hear the traffic from inside the hotel.  This is a brand new hotel so it was very clean and updated.  The breakfast room is very large, which did make it a bit noisy, but the breakfast was excellent.  The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi, Betsy S!  We appreciate your time to write us a very nice review! Our team works hard to provide our guests with the best in hospitality and we're glad to hear that you were satisfied. We are even more ecstatic to hear that you will choose our hotel again!  Until next time, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Overall we had a great stay at The Holiday Inn Express suites Anaheim. We were very happy with the size of our room, the free breakfast, pool, and the friendly staff.  We had a leaking air conditioner unit in the room which they fixed and dried out in a timely manner.  I would suggest they   clean the carpets in the halls and floors in the elevators more often but otherwise we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Hello, mabcc  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel. We apologize that you had a maintenance related issue in your room during your visit. Thank you for your understanding that such things happen no matter how much we prepare.  Your comments are very important to us and we appreciate your suggestions.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!   Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We have stayed at the Howard Johnson a few times, and we decided to give this new hotel a try - as they are practically next door to each other.  The rooms, as you would expect, are very nice and shiny. The beds were comfortable - and a choice of pillows was nice. We liked the breakfast, it's not a huge buffet, but perfectly adequate. Must admit, I didn't like the vast amount of rubbish we generated, but I guess having 'proper' plates and cutlery would add a lot of cost. We were delighted to get an unexpected bag of food when returning from the Disneyland half marathon (we were slow, and missed breakfast) - a nice, considerate, touch. I would also add that reception were very helpful.  The location is perfect for Disney - a short easy walk for anybody without mobility issues.
Manager Response: Hi, Ian D!  Thank you for trying us out and providing us feedback of your visit! We truly appreciate your detailed review of our hotel and facilities. We want to make sure that all of our guests have a comfortable stay. Should you encounter the same issue with noise on your next visit (we hope that you choose us again!), please inform us so that we may rectify the situation for you immediately.  Thank you again for giving us an opportunity to be your home base during the Disneyland Half Marathon!  Until next time, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great place to stay very close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here to do the Disneyland Half Marathon. Was so impressed with the facilities and service.  Danny set us up in a room away from the freeway so it was quite and was so welcoming.  The room was large enough that 4 people did not feel in each others way.  The room and bathroom were clean, the bed comfy, pillows comfortable, air at just the right temp. The cleaning staff was exceptional and checked on us later in the day to make sure all was satisfactory.  The breakfast was delicious and substantial.  Upon coming back from the Half marathon they had a goody bag of fruit, granola bar and water for our enjoyment.  The staff was really helpful, when we needed something out of the car they brought it to us and expected nothing in return.  The walk to the front gates of Disneyland
Manager Response: Hi, Joy A!  Congratulations on completing the Disneyland Half Marathon! We appreciate your review and kind words toward Danny and the rest of our team! We're very glad that your room was comfortable and our housekeeping team will be happy to hear you were very satisfied with their service. Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your promise to visit us again the next time!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Only a few minutes walk to Disney. This hotel is very friendly, clean. Room are very large 2 queen bed sand sofa. They supply a free breakfast which is adaquate. Pool area nice and clean. Would highly recommend a stay here very good.
Manager Response: Hi, wendy j!  From your friendly Holiday Inn Express we thank you for your review and rating our hotel! We are always happy to hear that our guests enjoyed their visit and best of all earned your high recommendations. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a very nice hotel located at a 15 minutes or less walk to Disneyland.  The staff is very polite and the room was very comfortable.  The breakfast was also included and it was very good.  If you prefer not to drive, there are several options to visit other areas outside of Anaheim.  You can use the city and the state transportation systems.  You can also use Uber, Lyft, and Super Shuttle, among other companies.  I used Lyft to get from the LAX airport to the hotel.  I used Uber to go to Irvine, Los Angeles, and Newport Beach. I also used Super Shuttle to go to the LAX airport.  There are also several restaurants at a walking distance from the hotel.  Great hotel with a very nice staff and at a great location.
Manager Response: Dear AyrFer,  Thank you for your wonderful review! Our entire team appreciates your kind words and details of the transportation options to and from the airport and going around the nearby cities. We do get a lot of questions from our guests about that so it is very helpful of you to mention them! We look forward to your next visit!  Many thanks,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Great place for first Disneyland trip
Summary: The hotel was a 10-15 minute walk to the park.  The room was clean and spacious.  The hotel staff were very welcoming and friendly.  My niece loved the pool, especially after a long day at the park.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi, northener81  Thank you for your visit and for reviewing our hotel! We appreciate your recommendation. It's the highest compliment we can ask for! We eagerly await for your next visit!  Many thanks,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Came here to see the fireworks show at Disney. It was a short walk to the Park. The walk was approximately 7 mins at a leisurely gait. The hotel also has free hot breakfast, which was very nice, and helps you save some money if planning a visit to the park. Also the parking was $15 per day so plan or factor that into your budget as parking is very scarce around Disney land. Anyway. Great location, close to the park, lots of restaurants in the vicinity and the hotel still smells new. Was not disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear spiritfilled30,  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! We are pleased to hear that you had a comfortable visit and that we did not dissapoint! We cannot wait to welcome you back to our hotel!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel next to Disneyland
Summary: This is a new hotel, open about 1 year. Our room was spacious – with a couch that could serve as bed if necessary. The bathroom was spacious and functioned well, although the clothing hook on the bathroom door was at a height that nearly hit my eye when I opened the bathroom door and leaned out. There is a small sink adjacent to the room refrigerator which was convenient when more than one person needed a sink. The room seemed well-insulated from external noises. Air conditioning was effective and relatively quiet. Beds were very comfortable and room was quiet. Wi-Fi was fine for our basic needs.  The breakfast room was spacious with good variety of hot foods, including sausage or bacon, biscuits and gravy, scrambled eggs, warm cinnamon buns, cold cereal, bananas and apples,
Manager Response: Dear 65Rambler,  We want to thank you for your stay and review of our hotel. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit and guests who visit this site will benefit from your detailed feedback!  We informed maintenance about your comments regarding the robe hook on the bathroom doors. Our entire team appreciates your wonderful comments as it validates the hard work that they do daily to provide our guests the best in hospitality. We hope that you will choose our hotel again should your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Perfect stay after a long day at Disneyland
Summary: After reading reviews on Trip Advisor I decided to book our one night stay at the Holiday Inn. The three of us were pleasantly surprised with our room and the hotel grounds. We were exhausted from our Disney day and were happy that breakfast was served until 9:30, this allowed us to sleep in a little. Looking forward to staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear BrittanyNicoleG,  Thank you for choosing our hotel based on our reviews in Trip Advisor! We appreciate your comments and thrilled that you had a perfect stay! Our entire team would be ecstatic to welcome you back on your next trip to Disneyland!  Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This hotel was clean, well laid out, with amazing firm beds. The location is great-- it was an easy walk to come back to the hotel mid-day to relax and then return to the parks for the evening. Breakfast was a zoo during prime time, but we made a point of going down as soon as we woke up to avoid the crowds.
Manager Response: Hi robyn14,  We appreciate your review! It was pleasing to hear that we were a great home base during your Disneyland vacation.  We planned ahead and built a seating area for breakfast large enough to handle our busy times. We do serve alot of guests at breakfast during our peak season!  We hope that we can be your home base again the next time you are in the Anaheim area. Warm regards,  Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel close to Disney
Summary: This is a nice new hotel with friendly staff and it was excellent value for such a good location. The bedrooms are large with a good sized seating area. The whole place was clean and the laundry very useful. The free breakfast was good quality and there were plenty of free tables each morning. We elected to valet park because we'd read the parking was difficult. This was a very easy option. It was about a 10 minute walk to the parks. Slightly too far to go back for missing items but close enough to feel we were staying on site. We cancelled our original booking because the hotel opening was significantly delayed but rebooked when it eventually opened. Glad we did.
Manager Response: Dear tourist_or_traveller,  We appreciate that you chose our hotel and rebooked us!  Thank you for your awesome feedback regarding our service and hotel overall.  We hope that you will choose us again on your next trip to Disneyland!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express  & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Beautiful new Holiday Inn Express within EASY walking distance of Disneyland! Upgraded to a suite and it was awesome!  So much room for just the three of us! Loved it! They have really nice artwork throughout which I don't typically notice but really liked. Pool and Splash pad are fantastic! Hot Breakfast was great! Staff was VERY VERY outgoing and friendly! Truly went above and beyond! Would definitely stay here again without hesitation. Price on it was very reasonable as well! The only downfall is the interstate noise, not much they can do as they can't move it. :)
Manager Response: Dear Shannon K,  We are so pleased to receive your review! Thank you for taking the time to let us know  how we did during your visit. It seems like you had an awesome vacation so thank you for choosing our hotel and making us a part of your memories! The entire team is indeed very, very outgoing. We are just happy to welcome our guests to our hotel! The artwork you mentioned were created specifically for our hotel and was chosen with care by our owners. Thank you for your compliments! If you happen to visit us again (we hope that you do!), please feel free to ask for a different room location so you can experience both sides of the hotel. See you again, soon!  Best regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Just came back from a wonderful 9 night stay at this hotel.  I think it would be very difficult to do better then this property if visiting Disneyland and the other SoCal or LA sights.  We arrived and were greeted by a nice and professional front desk person and got checked in very quickly.  Was fortunate to get an upgrade to a "Enchanted Suite".  Room was very good size, did not have a separate living area as such, but 2 queen beds and a large L-shaped couch which doubled as a pull out.  Basically had the pull out open the entire time and still had plenty of space to move around.  Rooms was exceptionally clean and well equipped.  Many lamps, good iron and ironing board, kurig machine, good sized mini fridge, microwave, USB plugs, ect.  Had a nice large HD TV with tons and tons
Manager Response: Dear TheVerro,  Wow! Thank you for a very thorough review and perfect rating of our hotel! It is fantastic to hear that you were very pleased with your accommodations and had a blast on your vacation! We appreciate that you chose our hotel for an extended visit! Our team are super excited that they were able to be a part of your vacation memories! Your extensive review will be much appreciated by all of our future guests travelling to our area. We would love nothing more than to welcome you back on your next trip to Anaheim!  Yours in hospitality, (the very happy)Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice place. I wish the rest of Holiday Inns were like this
Summary: Clean/ new place. Professional staff. If i come again, i use here.   For future: It was useful if they have kettle inside. Some ppl don't drink coffee but tea.  They use paper made plates and glasses for breakfast. it is good.  But I suggest them to totally replace the plastic knives and spoons and other glasses with paper bags. Please be environmentally friendly it goes a long way. I understand this is H I policy.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila23,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your comments. I will pass along your feedback to our breakfast team at IHG.  We are passionate about being green and loving our planet and agree with your sentiments. We hope you will visit us again!   Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Nice New Hotel!  Great for families visiting Disneyland.
Summary: I really liked this hotel.  It was new, clean and had breakfast included.  It is a bit of a walk to the park for younger families and the shuttle is a short walk away.  The room was spacious and had a great bed, I liked the room layout and the furnishings and art.  There is quite a bit of noise from the freeway that you can hear in the room and they could use some white noise machines or offer earplugs. The breakfast was scrambled eggs, sausage, yogurt, toast and jam, juice milk and coffee.  Its all pre-made or steam cooked but its quick and easy.  The front desk staff were nice as well as the fellows parking the cars.  I plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello, Funnymommy74!  Thank you for your visit and for rating our hotel with a perfect score! We appreciate your comments regarding your stay and experience. We will make sure to pass along your comments to the team regarding the service you received. We hope to see you again, soon!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Very comfortable room in a new hotel but a few hiccups and a credit card scam..
Summary: Just back from staying at this hotel for 14 days.  I guess being somewhere so long, you may have more time to assess things than normal (as I would say I typically stay somewhere for less time).  I am trying to give a fair assessment of our experience below - some positives and some negatives.  I would really like to be able to rate the hotel between average and very good... it had a lot of good points for sure but also on a few things (more service wise), we were let down a bit:  Firstly, the room was great in terms of space (we were five so had 2 queens and a sofa bed) and the room did not feel too cramped.  The beds were very very comfortable (as were the pillows).  We requested a room away from the freeway and were also able to see the fireworks from out of our window as
Manager Response: Dear Blebsie,  Thank you for your stay and thorough review of your visit. We appreciate the feedback you provided regarding both positive and negative things that you have experienced. Please accept our sincerest apologies in the areas where we have failed and know that we have addressed them with our team. We take our guests personal information with the utmost care and priority. We are investigating the concerns you brought up and working with our entire team to continue and keep our guests and their information safe. The  Resort area has a crime alert network and this incident has been passed on to them to keep our hotels alerted and informed. We appreciate your visit and hope that we will be able to welcome you back in the near future. Sincerely, Rachel L.

Summary Heading: AMAZING Hotel, Wonderful Staff, GREAT location!
Summary: As an IHG member I stay exclusively at Holiday Inn's, and this was by far the BEST I have stayed in.  The hotel is brand new, with a beautiful lobby, nice pool area and wonderful breakfast.  The rooms were amazing, as ours was a suite that had a huge couch that had a magnificent view of the Disneyland fireworks.  The location was perfect, off the main drag, yet a short walk to the Disney parks.  What made this hotel the best was the staff!  Extremely accommodating, friendly and customer service driven!  HIGHLY recommend staying here when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Hop2It2day,  Thank you for the AMAZING and wonderful review of our hotel and team! We are very pleased to hear that your stay was perfect specially the service you received from everyone! I'm sure that our entire team enjoyed providing your with hospitality as much as you enjoyed all aspects our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Disneyland!  Warm regards, Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New hotel, nice and very clean. Rooms very spacious and beds are really comfortable. Easy walk to Disneyland's main entrance. Staff are friendly; we were checked in by Rebecca who checked us in very quickly. We stayed for 6 nights at one of the Enchanted 2 Queen Suites, I called a couple of days prior to arrival and spoke to Savannah, I asked her if we could request a room on a higher floor not facing the freeway. She explained they can't guarantee anything as the rooms are assigned on the day of arrival, however that she would put a request on our reservation, she even said there are few of those rooms that have a view of the fireworks. I was so pleased to be put on a room that had a great view of the fireworks! We just had to open the curtains, turn the lights off, lay on the
Manager Response: Dear 2227225,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your visit and and wonderful comments regarding your stay! We will make sure to pass along your thanks to Savannah and Rebecca. They will be very thrilled to hear that they made a difference in your visit! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: If we go to Disneyland California again, I'll book this hotel in a heartbeat!
Summary: + modern hotel + 10 minute walk from the Disneyland-entrance + crispy clean rooms + good matrasses + WiFi works fine  N selfservice breakfast: toast, waffles, cereals, fruit, yoghurt etc. N bathroom with shower and bath N Valetparking available  - not much of a view from the room
Manager Response: Dear Rachel N  Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel. We appreciate that you loved our hotel and location that you'll book us again in a heartbeat! We truly hope to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Room and clean, but could be improved..
Summary: We stayed here at the end of July 2016 for 3 nights. It's a relatively new hotel from what we could tell. The room was spacious and we used the pool and gym which were good. It was a good base for visiting Disneyland for 2 days. Breakfast was included, however this let the hotel down. Everything was plastic or served in plastic. The plates, the cutlery, all the food & condiments were served in plastic. Unfortunately the breakfast tasted like plastic too. We felt that environmentally, this was very poor of the hotel to choose this path in serving breakfast and could be improved on compared to Holiday Inn Express' we have stayed in, in other countries.
Manager Response: Dear Yabbie76,  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel. While we are pleased to hear that you found our hotel spacious and the use of our amenities were good, we are saddened about your comments regarding breakfast. We apologize that you felt let down.  We definitely will pass on your comments to our breakfast team at IHG. Your feedback is much appreciated as it help us improve our operations and service delivery. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Wonderful new hotel walking distance to Disney!
Summary: This was our first time traveling to DL without a stroller so we wanted a hotel that was truly walking distance to the park. We stumbled across this holiday inn express on trip-advisor. As it is a brand new hotel, there are less reviews listed but I quickly noted that all the reviews written were great! So we booked. The hotel was beautiful, with a very sleek, Asian flare. Check in was quick and the front desk staff was excellent and attentive, especially Rebecca & Akul. Our room was clean and well-equipped with a refrigerator, and a nice bathroom. The room smelled slightly musty and warm, but it was clean. It faced the highway, and we were on the 2nd floor so we could hear the highway, but we were so tired from DL, it didn't impact our sleep. Breakfast was included in the
Manager Response: Dear chicagoland,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel! We are pleased that you stumbled upon us and booked us for your visit to Disneyland. We will pass on your wonderful comments to Rebecca and Akul! They will be very pleased to hear that they made a difference in your check in experience.  We noted the items you commented on regarding our facilities and appreciate the feedback as it helps us improve. Parking is indeed additional for staying around the Anaheim Resort. We strive hard to pass on the most minimal cost to our guests compared to the other hotels and venues in the area. We truly hope that we will be able to welcome you back to our hotel on your next  visit to Anaheim.  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New IHG property, valet parking, $15.00 a day, nice guys out front, easy walk to Disneyland. Check in at front desk was very welcoming and helpful and we got a great room. Others at desk were  not nearly as friendly, seemed preoccupied with work. Internet was good most of the time. The lobby area and breakfast area were very nice. Two elevators both good sized and easy to get in with a cart. Do think they should have chosen different hallway carpets/ they are already spotted and soiled, they will need to be replaced soon.  Breakfast had good suggestions but before 6:30 found hot decaf was not available and was told they don't make for early risers. That is very different. Also found they do not have trays.  Lighting in bathroom is not very bright and missed a tub. Small soap
Manager Response: Dear MaryModesto,  Thank you for your stay and perfect rating of our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and review of your visit. We value your comments and will certainly look at the items you mentioned. It will definitely help us improve our operations and service delivery. We hope that you will visit us again soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New hotel only 10 minute walk from Disneyland.  Room was spacious and front desk staff friendly and helpful. Hotel room was spacious, modern and clean. Breakfast could be better organised as there a long queue to access the food which was on only one side of the room.
Manager Response: Dear kcmelb2016,  Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is something our team takes great pride in, so we value your feedback.  We hope you will visit us again soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a great hotel. I went with my family to Disneyland and it wasn't long at all. I had a great vacation here. The staff of super nice an the free breakfast is great. I would gladly recommend. Thanks Holiday Inn!!!
Manager Response: To TheREALDarkLord,  Wow! We love your name! Thank you for your stay and perfect rating of our hotel! It is very pleasing to hear that you had a great vacation and loved our hotel! Thank you for the recommendation and hope to see you again!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: My family loved this hotel! The hotel is brand new, beds were comfy, the free breakfast is great! The pool is really nice and relaxing. The staff was great! This park is within walking distance to Disneyland. My only complaint is they charge $15+tax for parking. It ends up costing the same as parking at Disneyland but it does save the hassle of the parking garage and the trams. I definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher A,  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you for your stay and review of your visit! I'm sure that our entire team enjoyed having you here as much as your love our hotel and the service we provided! The parking fee is indeed imposed all around the Resort area and we strive to pass on the most economical fee to our guests. With our location and efficient valet team, it does make it hassle free to get to and from the park without worrying about your vehicle. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: The best hotel ever. Spacey rooms with comfortable beds.  Valet parking made it so easy and didn't mind paying since they took care of your vehicle.    Breakfast was organized well stocked and friendly staff and it is free.  Nice to have hot food available with so many choices.   The rates were from hotels.com and we couldn't have asked for more.  Very new hotel and everything was so clean. Walking distance to Disneyland with restaurants in between should u need to go back to the hotel to rest. Our family would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Disneyland or surrounding areas.
Manager Response: Hi, Denise O  Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel! We are pleased to hear that you thought our hotel was the best hotel over! We are puffing our chests with pride that we made a difference in your vacation! We hope that we will be able to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a great, new hotel that is really close to Disneyland.  The hotel was very clean and offered a really nice selection of food for breakfast.  It was an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  The best part of the hotel is the staff!!  Everyone we encountered was helpful and friendly.  There were two staff members who stood out the most for us:  The first employee is Savannah.  I emailed her with a question before our trip, and she assigned us to an AMAZING penthouse room on the 5th floor.  The room was absolutely beautiful and had plenty of space for us.  Also, the room has a wall of circular windows were really unique and offered great views and so much light!  I also emailed Savannah on the day of our arrival to let her know our flights had been delayed.  She assured me
Manager Response: Dear JimC12345,   Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! Your kind comments regarding Savannah and Akul are much appreciated! We'll make sure that they know how much they made a positive and lasting impression with you! We are thrilled to have your stamp of approval and endorsement! Please come and visit us again soon!  Best regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed here last weekend for a surprise birthday trip for my son. Customer service was great. The GM checked us in and got us a room even though we arrived at 11am. One morning when I sat down with my 1-year-old one of the breakfast staff was there almost instantly with a high chair without me even asking. The room cam with plenty of outlets for all the gadgets, a refrigerator, microwave, coffee machine, and a sink outside the bathroom. These are all the things that a modern hotel room should include now and they have it. Some have complained about the noise, but we faced the freeway and I didn't notice it at all. The location is fantastic, you can get out without having to drive right next to Disneyland and avoid traffic. The walk to disneyland is shorter than the walk from
Manager Response: Dear nicelynicely02,  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Birthday Trip To DisneyLand For The Wife
Summary: We had an amazing experience staying at this hotel.  We were checked in by Rebecca and Miquel who were so accommodating and friendly. We requested a crib and since we checked in at right around 5 pm we told them we were going to go eat and would just get it on our way back in from dinner; since we are season pass holders we decided after dinner to just go ahead and go to Disney for the parades and fireworks. WE were not expecting there to be a crib waiting for us. However once we got to our room not only was there a crib there but it was already set up and they even had a little blanket for our 14 month old girl. When we checked in I told them we were visiting for my wife's Birthday which was the next day.  The morning of my wife's birthday as the party of 6 was all getting
Manager Response: Dear Christopher W,  Thank you for your review and for choosing our hotel to celebrate your wife's birthday! Our entire team sends her an enormous birthday hug! We were thrilled to make her day special after learning it was her big day and how she loves Disneyland and Harry Potter (hope you made it to Universal Studios) We appreciate the awesome review of our entire front desk team and the detailed experience with our rooms and services. This will surely help out our future guests and travelers in the area.  We hope that you will stay with us on your next vacation celebration!  Until next time,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Stayed here with our two little girls on a trip to disneyland. The walk to and from Disney was about 15 minutes, only a few hotels closer. It's off the path so not a lot of traffic or people walking around making noise which made for a quiet stay. The hotel room was very new and clean. I had no worries about cleanliness and they even provided my baby with a crib, so one less thing to bring with us! Breakfast is free and definitely enough to fill you up before heading out to Disneyland. Staff was polite and helpful too.
Manager Response: Hello, nataleej!  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! We are very pleased that you enjoyed our hotel thus making your vacation fun and worry free! You share the same comments all of our guests have about the short walk and our close proximity to Disneyland. We appreciate that you mentioned that on your review. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We went to Disney for the week and picked this place kind of out of the hat (we had never been before). We will NEVER stay anywhere else! The staff was amazing, especially Savannah, everyone was extremely nice and helpful. The hotel was very nice and very comfy.  The walk to Disney was about as easy as could be, about 10 mins and we have an eight-year-old so we were very happy to have a short trip back to the room to rest! And yes, the breakfast was good too. Proteins and carbs, fruits, yoghurts, eggs and decent coffee. Overall, one the best stays I've had anywhere in a long time!!
Manager Response: Dear Iva,  We are so glad to hear that you chose our hotel for your last trip to Disney (thank the hat as well!) Thank you for a such a lovely review! Our entire team appreciates the "love" you sent our way by describing the FANTASTIC service you received! We hope that you will visit Disneyland soon and stay with us (no picking out of the hat anymore!)  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We enjoyed our 3 night stay. 10 minute walk to Disney.  Very clean. Best hotel breakfast I have ever had!  Warm cinnamon rolls!!!  Would definitely stay here again! I researched hotels in the Disney area for days.  They all look old!  I was so thankful when this new one popped up. I never heard any interstate noise. It was a great experience !
Manager Response: Hello, disneyhead5!  We enjoyed having you as our guest as well! Thank you for staying with us and giving us a perfect rating of your visit! We hope that your next stay is just around the corner..... we cannot wait to welcome you back!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary Heading: Very Nice New Hotel Near Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is a short walking distance to Disneyland.  We stayed in the penthouse suite which was very roomy but it would have been nice if the living area was actually separated by a partial wall so that we didn't have to whisper while my granddaughter was sleeping.  The room had big windows from which we could see the Disney fireworks.  A big con was that the suite did not have a bathtub only a large shower. Made it difficult to bath a 2 year old.  There was a kitchenette but it had no utencils, plates or dishcloths.  The suite had a couple of tables but they were not really suitable to sit around and eat a meal.  There were not much in the way of closet or dresser space for a room that size.  Breakfast was fine.  Valet parking was good (fee is $15 per day for parking).  The
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean & New hotel. The staff here was awesome! Savannah especially! Very professional with a good sense of leadership! Made my stay absolutely perfect! Will definitely stay here again when travelling on business!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property! I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one and that you enjoyed our staff! We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future. Savannah and the rest of the team will be excited to hear that you will be returning to us when you visit Anaheim!

Summary: We were on the quiet side away from the freeway. Room was nice, people next door were pretty noisy and could hear everything they were saying. They had small children which was understandable but took no measures to keep them quiet! Room itself was clean and had everything we needed. Breakfast was good. Great walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl K,  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel and services! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit! Pls. accept our apologies for the noise issue in your neighboring room.  For future reference, please reach out to our Guest Service Representatives and we can call the room to ask them to quiet down. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and were very happy with our stay. We were two adults and two kids under 3 and we had plenty of space to hang out. The first night we had an issue with the tub because it wasn't draining properly but it was resolved within 30 min of notifying the front desk. Breakfast was just enough and constantly getting restocked as more people arrived. It was at least a 10 min walk to the park gates so super convenient for afternoon naps and tired feet. We did not use the pool but I took pictures to share since I'm sure others are as curious as I was.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! We are happy to hear that you were quite pleased with your visit. We appreciate the comments your provided and glad that we were able to recover well on the areas that you had an issue with. Next time, do take advantage of our relaxing pool area. We receive a lot of compliments on it!  We hope to have the pleasure of your visit again soon!  Sincerely,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: We brought a group of 50 High Schoolers to HIE Express for a Choir Competition. The staff and manager went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. Rachel and Stacey are rock stars of service! They helped us put itineraries and gifts in each room, they helped us print things out and make copies. When our school van broke down, and we had to get lunch at a certain time for all the kids to eat before the competition, the manager even drove us to pick up the lunch so the kids could eat and would not be late to sing. The rooms were very spacious and the kids thought the sofa beds were even more comfortable than the beds (which were also very comfortable and new). The pillows were awesome, too. Many of our group wondered where we could buy them? We walked to and from Disneyland
Manager Response: Hi, Amy!!  What a lovely review! We are humbled by your kind words and praises for our hotel and team! Your group was very lovely and the kids were very polite. It was so much fun for us to host your entire group and we were sad when y'all left! it was our pleasure to provide what you needed to make your trip to Anaheim successful!  Our resident magician, Akul sends his thanks for your appreciation! He lives for great comments from our guests! I will have Stacy send you the email information on where to purchase the pillows that you loved during your visit. I passed along your comments and suggestions to our executive team to review. Amy, thank you choosing our hotel! Give our best  to the kids and hope to see you all soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a new hotel that is about a 10 minute walk to the front gate of Disneyland. The lobby is very nicely set up and the front desk clerk that check us in was very nice and accommodating. They let us checked in early and we were given the exact room that we reserved. The room was a large 2 queen bedroom with a pull out couch and everything had a very clean and modern feel to it. The pool is very nice and a good stop for relaxing entertainment before or after Disneyland. The breakfast was good and the staff was very friendly and tried to meet request the best that they could. The business center was beneficial and worked well to get checked into our flight. I would stay at this hotel again in a heart beat and even though this hotel isn't rated high yet take note that the
Manager Response: Dear RelaxedYo,  Thank you, thank you for your perfect rating of our hotel and a very thorough review! We feel the love! Our goal is to provide our guests with an excellent experience all around during their visit and we are so happy that we made that happen for you!  Thank you for your visit and hope to see you again very soon!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Although I only stayed one night, I really enjoyed my experience at this hotel. The hotel is clean with new, very modern, furnishings. The staff was all very friendly and helpful. It is within walking distance of the Disneyland Resort, however ART picks up at the Howard Johnson across the street if a shuttle is needed. This hotel is great for couples and families, however young children might get bored with the pool as compared to other pools and water playgrounds at some of the other area hotels.
Manager Response: Dear thekneal,  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! We always love to hear back from our guests regarding their experience during their visit with us and appreciate that you enjoyed our hotel. Although our hotel's pool is fully operational, we are still enhancing our Splash Zone area for the kids so we hope that you are able to return to experience that. Hope to see you soon!  Sincerely,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: New hotel, opened February 2016. We transferred here from another Holiday Inn a few miles away. The staff were very helpful in finding us a good room at short notice. The room was large with 2 queen beds, separate large seating area with coffee table & sink, fridge,microwave & coffee maker.(no kettle) Disposable plates, cutlery inc. All very clean. Beds very comfortable and choice of pillows. Coffee available from restaurant all day foc. Standard breakfast choice but always well presented hot & plentiful. Lovely outside pool although not heated, pleasant seating area. Excellent friendly staff. Within walking distance of Disney, tour booking office & plenty choice restaurants. Taxi service available to take you on excursions or out to dinner, we also used them to return us to the
Manager Response: Hello Kate778!  Thank you for choosing and transferring to our hotel! We appreciate the excellent marks you provided and wonderful comments regarding our hotel and the service you received!  We aim to provide our guests with the utmost in service and glad that we were able to provide that for you.  We hope to see you upon your return to the Anaheim area!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: The front desk staff all wore the most festive shirts that reminded me of Hawaii!  Great attitude and exceptional customer service from all three front desk agents!  The location was perfect for Disneyland, we walked pretty much across the street.  The Hotel itself is AMAZING, everything brand new and well thought out.  This is definitely a great IHG option close to Disneyland, and we could not have been more impressed.  Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear Garrett P!  Thank you for your lovely review and for choosing our hotel for your Disneyland vacation! We're glad that you noticed our festive shirts! The goal is to have our guests thinking vacation as soon as they walk in the door! Thank you for the "love" and awesome compliments! It warms our heart that we made a good impression on you during your stay. It will be our pleasure to welcome you again, soon!  Much appreciation, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Less than 10 minute walk to Disneyland was very convenient. The room was very clean and beds were comfortable. Even if your room is next to the freeway you hardly hear it. All of the desk staff were friendly and very helpful. The breakfast varied each day and was a good variety. Overall a highly recommended hotel and we will be back on our next visit to Disney. Also very closely located to panera and McDonald's which was good.
Manager Response: Hello Samantha N!  Thank you for your visit and making us a part of your Disneyland vacation! We appreciate the lovely comments about our hotel and staff along with the perfect rating! We do get a lot of compliments on our breakfast and glad that you found it of good variety.  Thank you for the high recommendation and see you on your next trip to Disneyland!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: Not all rooms were available at predetermined check in time. At breakfast, a few times staff needed to be notified to refill empty food containers. Rooms were clean, safe, and of decent size. Gym had no water fountain nor fan. Reasonable distance to walk to Disneyland. Quiet and safe.
Manager Response: Dear Mamafram,  Thank you for your most recent visit at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback regarding your visit. We strive hard to provide all of our guests a great experience during their stay and sincerely apologize that we failed in delivering that for you. We do our best to accommodate all of our group requests.   Your requests of having specific locations, room types and our high occupancy on the day of your arrival proved to be a challenge to have 100% of all  your requested rooms ready at 3 PM. We appreciate your patience and understanding of the matter and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused. Our exercise facility does have a water cooler and central air.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to make it right on your next visit.  Respectfully yours, Rachel L.

Summary: My sister used to work for holiday inn and badly wanted to try this new hotel and it's extremely close to the parks so we walked everyday. That was great. As a gift my sister paid for my room but we checked in first and I put my card down for incidentals in the room. I told them that my sister is paying for both rooms on her card and that she will be arriving shortly. When she arrived she paid for both rooms and we thought all was settled until that night at Disneyland my card was declined for a purchase. I was shocked as I know I have money on my card I've just started my trip. I looked at my bank statement and it had under $30 in there. So I rang the bank mind you this is Australia bank so different time zones too. And they told me there was a payment of US$435 for room at
Manager Response: Dear missymooch,  Thank you for your stay and candid comments regarding your visit. I sincerely apologize that your holiday did not go as planned due to several incidents you experienced prior to arriving to our hotel. Our management team has handled your credit card issue personally and done everything you requested from us to rectify the situation with your bank in Australia on the weekend it occurred. Unfortunately, when the incident happened, you mentioned in your email to us that your bank was giving you the run around. It is not our intention to frustrate or upset our valued guests such as yourself. If you find that you still have an issue, please feel free to contact me directly.  I am concerned when you mentioned you did not receive the free night that was adjusted off your bill. In your previous email to us, you have made reference to the credit that was posted on your credit card from us for one night stay. Again, please feel free to contact me to further investigate this in the event that you still having any issue. Thank you for the opportunity to address your concerns. We hope that your travels back home to Australia has been uneventful.  Sincerely, Rachel L.

Summary: We had a great time and a very professional staff and love the walking distance to the park. A hot breakfast was a nice surprise and this hotel is brand new. The pool was nice to unwind after visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear mikestrek,  Thank you for your stay and taking the time to review our hotel!  Our entire team appreciate your kind words and glad that your were able to enjoy our hotel thoroughly.  There are no better words to hear from our guests than "we will be back"!  So here's to next time!  Cheers,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim Resort

Summary: This is a brand new hotel, we stayed in late April, the staff were great we were able to check in early. The free breakfast was a plus, parking is limited but with valet it was no hassle at all. It was about a 10 minute walk to Disney, we will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear tmdaz,  Thank you for your stay and reviewing us with a perfect rating! Our entire team is ecstatic to know that your stay went well and that you will return to our hotel!  Until next time,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim

Summary: We chose this hotel because it is very new. I was told it started in Feb 2016, in fact you can see that on Google maps street view Oct 2015, it is still under construction. We stayed for 6 nights. Location is just off I-5, infact I-5 goes right by it, but we didn't hear any noises from it, but then we were on the opposite side of the highway. There is a little gift shop near by and I recommend you buy souvenirs from there instead of DL. We rented a car so Walmart and other few stores are minutes away. The hotel is less than ten min walk from Disneyland, you can enjoy the fireworks half a block from outside the hotel. Mcdonalds, Ihop and few other eateries on the way to DL. We didn't try it, but they have an outdoor pool. Decent free breakfast and good Wi-fi connection, just
Manager Response: Hello, Gill-DS!  Thank you for your stay and detailed review of your visit! We love that we were able to be your home base for six days during your visit. We appreciate the tips you provided not just about our hotel but the area as well. We are sure that other guests coming to our hotel and area will be pleased that you were so very thorough with your review!  Please come and visit us again soon!  Best regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great breakfast and sleeping arrangements for families with young ones!
Summary: As all others have said, it's new, clean, and a lovely hotel.   The breakfast is extensive including pancakes, sausage, muffins, bagels, toast, cereal, instant oatmeal in a few flavors, juices, milk, coffee, tea, regular & Greek yogurt, apples, oranges, bananas, and there is peanut butter, jelly, & cream cheese.  We stayed in a room with 2 queens (the front desk told us all the kings were on the freeway side of the building) also thinking one kid in the 2nd queen and the other on the sofa bed. The sofa has a lounger on one side that we made a toddler bed! Could fit a 2-4 year old there easily! I wedged the sofa cushion between the pull out and my "toddler bed". If you had an infant, the bathroom is large enough for a pack n play if you like to do that. So, you really could fit 2
Manager Response: Dear Aleasha S.  We truly appreciate your review of our hotel! You have described our amenities extremely well based on your experience! Thank you for letting us be a part of your family vacation and hope that we will be able to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future!  Warm regards, Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim

Summary: I liked how close they were to downtown Disney. The staff went above and beyond helpfulness. Our room was very comfortable and the quick pick breakfast was nice to grab before walking or catching shuttle. Quiet floor too. Really we had no issues at all.
Manager Response: Hello, Bergind!  Thank you for your stay and review of our hotel! Our team are extremely glad that you found our hotel and service worthy of 5 stars! Come visit us again the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Best regards,  Rachel and team @ Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim

Summary: Brand new so everything clean and fresh. The staff was wonderful and were very gracious with answering all our questions. I hab forgot some items, toothbrush etc., and staff rounded up replacements. The complimentary breakfast was the excellent and all food items were kept full and fresh. As for location, right off I-5 and only a few blocks to Disney main entrance. Great stay!
Manager Response: Dear dmillerpac,  We appreciate your kind comments regarding your recent visit to our hotel! Thank you for allowing us to be your home while visiting the Anaheim area. We sincerely hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim

Summary: I called to ask if we could get an early check-in and the gentleman at the front desk was very informative about what our options were. He searched to see if we could check-in early and he accommodated us over the phone. Upon arriving we met Danny, whom I had spoken over the phone and it was very nice to know he remembered our phone conversation. He was very efficient and asked us if we had our Disney tickets, which we had already bought. He was very informative and we look forward to many more stays with this exceptional customer service.
Manager Response: Hello accordtyper85,  Thank you for you visit and review of our hotel! We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations with the check in process and your overall visit.  Danny will be thrilled to hear that he made a difference with your experience in a positive way! We'll make sure to pass the compliments along!  We'll hold you to your promise of many more stays at our hotel!  Until next time,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim

Summary: We didnt read any reviews before booking this hotel. We, a family of 5, just wanted something decent within walking distance from Disney. We were all pleasently surprised. Nice and new hotel, very clean and spacious room with comfortable beds. Good complementary breakfast with lots to choose from. If we have to find something a little negative, it would be that we had to pay 15$ a day for parking. We can definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Gunilla L,  Hello from our entire team! We are glad to hear that you were pleasantly surprised with our location and amenities! We aim to WOW our guest and ensure that their visit to our hotel and area be MAGICAL! Parking for both valet and self park are priced the same and much lower than the other hotels in the area. The fee ensures that we are able to accommodate all of our guests' parking needs while providing top notch safety and security for their vehicles.   We appreciate that you chose our hotel and hope to see you again, soon!  Kind regards,  Rachel and Team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim

Summary: We stayed for one night and did not arrive until almost midnight.  The staff were very friendly and made us feel very welcome.  I did read in previous reviews about the noise from the highway.  We were on the 5th floor facing the highway and we did hear the noise.  It was not so bad that you could not sleep.  I am a pretty light sleeper and I did ok.  The room was very clean and the breakfast was great. The only complaint I have is the parking, only valet available and cost $15.  But to be honest that is the price with most hotels in the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Dear Crissy R.  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you for you for leaving us a review about your most recent visit to our hotel. Our entire team appreciates your thoughts and glad to hear that your stay went well! For your next visit, both valet and self park is available for the same fee (and you are right! We have the most economical parking fee in the area!). The valet team makes it convenient to access your vehicle and does provide in and out privileges throughout the day.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim and Disneyland!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim

Summary: It was a typical Holiday Inn Express I have experienced in the past - clean, comfortable, convenient, and economical (free, hot breakfast was is always a plus). Location was also fantastic - just 10-minute walking distance to Disneyland that you don't have to worry about traffic or fiding a parking space. But the room my family stayed was too noisy because of the heavy traffic right beside the hotel (major thoroughfare was running parallel to the hotel).
Manager Response: Dear VanKevink,  Hello from Anaheim! Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel. While we are excited to hear that you considered our hotel's location fantastic, it saddens me that your stay was ruined by the noise. We are conveniently located close to a major interstate and we have made provisions to install double pane windows in all of our rooms. We hope that you will give us an opportunity and try us again on your next visit to Anaheim.  We'll make sure that you get to try out room types in different locations within the hotel.  Again, thank you for your stay and loyalty to our Brand.  Sincerely,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Anaheim

Summary Heading: Top choice for Disney with superb staff
Summary: I stayed for 4 nights with my wife and 3 children.  The hotel is easy to find and very close to Disney, perhaps a 10-15 minute walk, so ideal to save on the parking costs of Disney.  However, the hotel charges $15 per day plus taxes, please like other reviewers have said, just make it a rounded up cost! Valet or no valet, it’s the same cost. Check in was easy, IHG level recognised and friendly welcome by Akul. He was great and a credit to the IHG chain.  We were upgraded to a very nice room, super spacious and well equipped.  Very comfy sofa bed too which I would have expected as the hotel is very new.  The room was bright and airy and you can hear the noise from the freeway but for me and the family this was never really an issue as the aircon ‘muffled’ this.  We did have
Manager Response: Dear scopie100,  Wow! What an awesome review! Our entire team is super excited to receive the "Top Choice for Disney" award from you! We are extremely grateful for your kind words and the shout out to Akul!  Thank you for the "guest love" for our rooms, breakfast and other facilities!  Please come back and see us again soon!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Anaheim

Summary: Great location of you don't mind the 15 minute walk.  Hotel is new.  I kept wondering if they regretted their tile color choice for the lobby.
